anya-e0101n:154_6: antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhopi itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā evamāha –

anya-e0101n:155_1: ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane
anya-e0101n:155_2: mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo ābhisamācārikesu
anya-e0101n:156_0: Gocaro pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti.
anya-e0101n:156_8: Yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
anya-e0101n:157_1: Idha bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī susaṃvuto gacchati,
anya-e0101n:158_7: Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena upeto…pe…
anya-e0101n:159_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo.
anya-e0101n:159_1: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:159_3: Ettha ca “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti ettāvatā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:159_4: “Ācāragocarasampanno”tiādi pana sabbaṃ yathāpaṭipannassa taṃ sīlaṃ sampajjati,
anya-e0101n:161_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ tadanantaraṃ “so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādinā nayena dassitaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:161_3: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
anya-e0101n:161_9: Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n:161_10: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho”ti.
anya-e0101n:161_11: Na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:161_13: Nānubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anuanubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjananti laddhavohāraṃ hatthapādasitahasitakathitavilokitādibhedaṃ
anya-e0101n:162_0: Theraṃ kira cetiyapabbatā anurādhapuraṃ piṇḍacāratthāya āgacchantaṃ aññatarā kulasuṇhā sāmikena saddhiṃ
anya-e0101n:162_1: bhaṇḍitvā sumaṇḍitapasādhitā devakaññā viya kālasseva anurādhapurato nikkhamitvā ñātigharaṃ gacchantī
anya-e0101n:162_3: Thero kimetanti olokento tassā dantaṭṭhike asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n:164_0: Tattheva so ṭhito thero, arahattaṃ apāpuṇī”ti.
anya-e0101n:165_0: Sāmikopi kho panassā anumaggaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā “kiñci, bhante,
anya-e0101n:166_0: “Nābhijānāmi itthī vā, puriso vā ito gato;
anya-e0101n:168_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:168_1: asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anubandheyyuṃ.
anya-e0101n:168_2: Tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n:168_5: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
anya-e0101n:168_6: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:168_7: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0101n:168_8: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0101n:168_12: Tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
anya-e0101n:169_1: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
anya-e0101n:169_2: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:169_4: Evaṃ honto pana so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:169_5: Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:169_8: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā honti,
anya-e0101n:169_9: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
anya-e0101n:169_12: evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:170_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:170_3: Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti,
anya-e0101n:170_4: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
anya-e0101n:170_5: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
anya-e0101n:170_6: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:170_8: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
anya-e0101n:173_1: Idāni indriyasaṃvarasīlānantaraṃ vutte ājīvapārisuddhisīle ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānanti
anya-e0101n:173_2: yāni tāni “ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
anya-e0101n:173_6: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā ‘yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā’ti bhaṇati,
anya-e0101n:173_8: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:173_10: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:173_12: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:173_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0101n:174_2: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena
anya-e0101n:174_3: vā iriyāpathassa vā aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:175_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paresaṃ ālapanā lapanā sallapanā ullapanā
anya-e0101n:175_2: samullapanā unnahanā samunnahanā ukkācanā samukkācanā anuppiyabhāṇitā cāṭukamyatā muggasūpyatā pāribhaṭyatā,
anya-e0101n:176_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yaṃ paresaṃ nimittaṃ nimittakammaṃ obhāso obhāsakammaṃ sāmantajappā parikathā,
anya-e0101n:177_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paresaṃ akkosanā vambhanā garahanā ukkhepanā
anya-e0101n:177_2: samukkhepanā khipanā saṃkhipanā pāpanā sampāpanā avaṇṇahārikā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā,
anya-e0101n:178_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissito pāpiccho icchāpakato ito laddhaṃ āmisaṃ amutra harati,
anya-e0101n:178_2: amutra vā laddhaṃ āmisaṃ idha āharati.
anya-e0101n:178_3: Yā evarūpā āmisena āmisassa eṭṭhi gaveṭṭhi pariyeṭṭhi esanā gavesanā pariyesanā,
anya-e0101n:179_2: Kuhananiddese tāva lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassāti lābhañca sakkārañca kittisaddañca sannissitassa,
anya-e0101n:180_0: Ito paraṃ yasmā paccayapaṭisevanasāmantajappanairiyāpathasannissitavasena mahāniddese tividhaṃ kuhanavatthu āgataṃ.
anya-e0101n:180_1: Tasmā tividhampetaṃ dassetuṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vāti evamādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:180_2: Tattha cīvarādīhi nimantitassa tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ nissāya paṭikkhipanena,
anya-e0101n:180_3: te ca gahapatike attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe ñatvā puna tesaṃ “aho ayyo appiccho na kiñci paṭiggaṇhituṃ icchati,
anya-e0101n:180_4: suladdhaṃ vata no assa sace appamattakampi kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvarādīni
anya-e0101n:180_5: upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva āvikatvā paṭiggahaṇena ca tato pabhuti api sakaṭabhārehi upanāmanahetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:181_9: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo susānā vā saṅkārakūṭā vā pāpaṇikā vā nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāreyya.
anya-e0101n:181_10: Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena piṇḍapātena etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo uñchācariyāya piṇḍiyālopena jīvikaṃ kappeyya.
anya-e0101n:181_12: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo rukkhamūliko vā assa abbhokāsiko vā.
anya-e0101n:181_14: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo pūtimuttena vā hariṭakīkhaṇḍena vā osadhaṃ kareyyā’ti.
anya-e0101n:181_19: tamenaṃ gahapatikā evaṃ jānanti ‘ayaṃ samaṇo appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo dhutavādo’ti.
anya-e0101n:181_23: ‘tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati.
anya-e0101n:181_24: Saddhāya sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati.
anya-e0101n:181_37: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:182_0: Pāpicchasseva pana sato uttarimanussadhammādhigamaparidīpanavācāya tathā tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:183_1: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti ariyadhammasannissitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati ‘yo evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0101n:183_9: Yo evarūpe vihāre vasati aḍḍhayoge pāsāde hammiye guhāyaṃ leṇe kuṭiyā kūṭāgāre aṭṭe māḷe uddaṇḍe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ maṇḍape rukkhamūle vasati,
anya-e0101n:183_11: Atha vā ‘korajikakorajiko bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko kuhakakuhako lapakalapako mukhasambhāviko,
anya-e0101n:183_12: ayaṃ samaṇo imāsaṃ evarūpānaṃ santānaṃ vihārasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī’ti tādisaṃ gambhīraṃ gūḷhaṃ nipuṇaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
anya-e0101n:183_14: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:184_0: Pāpicchasseva pana sato sambhāvanādhippāyakatena iriyāpathena vimhāpanaṃ iriyāpathasannissitaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:184_2: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti gamanaṃ saṇṭhapeti,
anya-e0101n:184_14: yā evarūpā iriyāpathassa aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:185_0: Tattha paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti paccayapaṭisevananti evaṃ saṅkhātena paccayapaṭisevanena vā saṅkhātena.
anya-e0101n:186_0: Lapanāniddese ālapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā,
anya-e0101n:186_3: ahaṃ pacchato pattaṃ gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti evaṃ āditova lapanā.
anya-e0101n:186_6: mayi asuko ca asuko ca rājamahāmatto pasanno”ti evaṃ attupanāyikā lapanā ālapanā.
anya-e0101n:186_8: Sallapanāti gahapatikānaṃ ukkaṇṭhane bhītassa okāsaṃ datvā datvā suṭṭhu lapanā.
anya-e0101n:186_9: Ullapanāti mahākuṭumbiko mahānāviko mahādānapatīti evaṃ uddhaṃ katvā lapanā.
anya-e0101n:187_0: Unnahanāti “upāsakā pubbe īdise kāle navadānaṃ detha,
anya-e0101n:187_1: idāni kiṃ na dethā”ti evaṃ yāva “dassāma, bhante,
anya-e0101n:187_5: Atha vā ucchuhatthaṃ disvā “kuto ābhataṃ upāsakā”ti pucchati.
anya-e0101n:187_7: Kiṃ tattha ucchu madhuranti. Khāditvā, bhante,
anya-e0101n:188_2: mayhameva detī”ti evaṃ ukkhipitvā kācanā ukkācanā,
anya-e0101n:189_0: Anuppiyabhāṇitāti saccānurūpaṃ dhammānurūpaṃ vā anapaloketvā punappunaṃ piyabhaṇanameva.
anya-e0101n:189_1: Cāṭukamyatāti nīcavuttitā attānaṃ heṭṭhato heṭṭhato ṭhapetvā vattanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:189_3: Yathā hi muggesu paccamānesu kocideva na paccati,
anya-e0101n:189_5: evaṃ yassa puggalassa vacane kiñcideva saccaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:189_10: Yo hi kuladārake dhāti viya aṅkena vā khandhena vā paribhaṭati,
anya-e0101n:190_0: Nemittikatāniddese nimittanti yaṃkiñci paresaṃ paccayadānasaññājanakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ.
anya-e0101n:190_1: Nimittakammanti khādanīyaṃ gahetvā gacchante disvā “kiṃ khādanīyaṃ labhitthā”tiādinā nayena nimittakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:190_3: Obhāsakammanti vacchapālake disvā “kiṃ ime vacchā khīragovacchā udāhu takkagovacchā”ti pucchitvā “khīragovacchā,
anya-e0101n:190_6: bhikkhūpi khīraṃ labheyyu”nti evamādinā nayena tesaṃ dārakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ nivedetvā khīradāpanādikaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:191_0: Kulūpako kira bhikkhu bhuñjitukāmo gehaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0101n:191_1: Taṃ disvā adātukāmā gharaṇī “taṇḍulā natthī”ti bhaṇantī taṇḍule āharitukāmā viya paṭivissakagharaṃ gatā.
anya-e0101n:191_2: Bhikkhupi antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā olokento kavāṭakoṇe ucchuṃ,
anya-e0101n:191_8: Bhikkhu “upāsike ‘ajja bhikkhā na sampajjissatī’ti paṭikacceva nimittaṃ addasa”nti āha. Kiṃ, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n:191_9: Kavāṭakoṇe nikkhittaṃ ucchuṃ viya sappaṃ addasaṃ,
anya-e0101n:191_10: ‘taṃ paharissāmī’ti olokento bhājane ṭhapitaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pāsāṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:191_11: leḍḍukena pahaṭena sappena kataṃ piṭake nikkhittaloṇamacchaphālasadisaṃ phaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:191_12: tassa taṃ leḍḍuṃ ḍaṃsitukāmassa kumbhiyā taṇḍulasadise dante,
anya-e0101n:191_13: athassa kupitassa ghaṭe pakkhittaghatasadisaṃ mukhato nikkhamantaṃ visamissakaṃ kheḷanti.
anya-e0101n:191_14: Sā “na sakkā muṇḍakaṃ vañcetu”nti ucchuṃ datvā odanaṃ pacitvā ghataguḷamacchehi saddhiṃ sabbaṃ adāsīti.
anya-e0101n:191_15: Evaṃ samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:191_16: Parikathāti yathā taṃ labhati tassa parivattetvā kathananti.
anya-e0101n:192_3: Ukkhepanāti mā etaṃ ettha kathethāti vācāya ukkhipanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:192_4: Sabbatobhāgena savatthukaṃ sahetukaṃ katvā ukkhepanā samukkhepanā.
anya-e0101n:192_5: Atha vā adentaṃ disvā “aho dānapatī”ti evaṃ ukkhipanaṃ ukkhepanā.
anya-e0101n:192_7: Khipanāti kiṃ imassa jīvitaṃ bījabhojinoti evaṃ uppaṇḍanā.
anya-e0101n:192_9: yo niccakālaṃ sabbesampi natthīti vacanaṃ detīti suṭṭhutaraṃ uppaṇḍanā.
anya-e0101n:192_12: Avaṇṇahārikāti evaṃ me avaṇṇabhayāpi dassatīti gehato gehaṃ gāmato gāmaṃ janapadato janapadaṃ avaṇṇaharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:192_13: Parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti purato madhuraṃ bhaṇitvā parammukhe avaṇṇabhāsitā.
anya-e0101n:192_14: Esā hi abhimukhaṃ oloketuṃ asakkontassa parammukhānaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ khādanamiva hoti,
anya-e0101n:192_16: Ayaṃ vuccati nippesikatāti ayaṃ yasmā veḷupesikāya viya abbhaṅgaṃ parassa guṇaṃ nippeseti nipuñchati,
anya-e0101n:192_17: yasmā vā gandhajātaṃ nipisitvā gandhamagganā viya paraguṇe nipisitvā vicuṇṇetvā esā lābhamagganā hoti,
anya-e0101n:193_6: Ādito paṭṭhāya laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ tatra tatra kuladārakānaṃ datvā ante khīrayāguṃ labhitvā gatabhikkhuvatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:194_0: Idāni evamādīnañca pāpadhammānanti ettha ādisaddena “yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni
anya-e0101n:194_1: bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappenti.
anya-e0101n:194_6: dabbihoma”nti ādinā nayena brahmajāle vuttānaṃ anekesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:194_7: Iti yvāyaṃ imesaṃ ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamavasena,
anya-e0101n:194_8: imesañca “kuhanā lapanā nemittikatā nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti evamādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vasena pavatto micchājīvo,
anya-e0101n:194_12: Etaṃ āgamma jīvantīti ājīvo. Ko so,
anya-e0101n:196_2: tattha paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā,
anya-e0101n:196_4: Ettha ca sītassa paṭighātāyātiādinā nayena vuttapaccavekkhaṇameva “yoniso paṭisaṅkhā”ti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:196_9: ettakameva hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ yadidaṃ sītassa paṭighātāyātiādi,
anya-e0101n:196_11: Sītassāti ajjhattadhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhāutupariṇāmanavasena vā uppannassa yassa kassaci sītassa.
anya-e0101n:196_15: Sītabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:196_16: tasmā sītassa paṭighātāya cīvaraṃ paṭisevitabbanti bhagavā anuññāsi.
anya-e0101n:196_25: Sarīsapāti ye keci sarantā gacchanti dīghajātikā sappādayo,
anya-e0101n:196_26: tesaṃ daṭṭhasamphasso ca phuṭṭhasamphasso cāti duvidho samphasso,
anya-e0101n:196_27: sopi cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinnaṃ na bādhati,
anya-e0101n:196_28: tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya paṭisevati.
anya-e0101n:196_33: Yasmiṃ yasmiñhi aṅge vivariyamāne hirī kuppati vinassati,
anya-e0101n:196_34: taṃ taṃ hiriṃ kopanato hirikopīnanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:197_1: Yo hi koci āhāro bhikkhuno piṇḍolyena patte patitattā piṇḍapātoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:197_3: tattha tattha laddhānaṃ bhikkhānaṃ sannipāto samūhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:197_4: Neva davāyāti na gāmadārakādayo viya davatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:197_6: Na madāyāti na muṭṭhikamallādayo viya madatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:197_8: Na maṇḍanāyāti na antepurikavesiyādayo viya maṇḍanatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:197_10: Na vibhūsanāyāti na naṭanaccakādayo viya vibhūsanatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:197_12: Ettha ca neva davāyāti etaṃ mohūpanissayappahānatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:197_14: Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti etaṃ rāgūpanissayappahānatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:197_15: Neva davāya na madāyāti cetaṃ attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:197_16: Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti etaṃ parassapi saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:197_17: Catūhipi cetehi ayoniso paṭipattiyā kāmasukhallikānuyogassa ca pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_6: akkhabbhañjanamiva ca sākaṭiko kāyassa ṭhitatthaṃ yāpanatthañcesa piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n:198_9: tasmā imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti ettāvatā etassa kāyassa jīvitindriyapavattāpanatthantipi vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_13: Brahmacariyānuggahāyāti sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ca maggabrahmacariyassa ca anuggahatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_14: Ayañhi piṇḍapātapaṭisevanapaccayā kāyabalaṃ nissāya sikkhattayānuyogavasena bhavakantāranittharaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:199_0: Itipurāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti etaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
anya-e0101n:199_4: Atha vā yā adhunā asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ nissāya purāṇakammapaccayavasena uppajjanato purāṇavedanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:199_5: Sappāyaparimitabhojanena tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi.
anya-e0101n:199_6: Yā cāyaṃ adhunā kataṃ ayuttaparibhogakammūpacayaṃ nissāya āyatiṃ uppajjanato navavedanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:199_7: Yuttaparibhogavasena tassā mūlaṃ anibbattento taṃ navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:199_8: Ettāvatā yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho attakilamathānuyogappahānaṃ dhammikasukhāpariccāgo ca dīpito hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:200_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti parimitaparibhogena jīvitindriyupacchedakassa iriyāpathabhañjakassa vā parissayassa
anya-e0101n:200_1: abhāvato cirakālagamanasaṅkhātā yātrā ca me bhavissati imassa paccayāyattavuttino kāyassātipi paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n:200_9: catupañcālopamattaūnabhojanena catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanato phāsuvihāro ca me bhavissatītipi paṭisevati.
anya-e0101n:203_0: Ettāvatā ca payojanapariggaho majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:204_1: Yattha yattha hi seti vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā,
anya-e0101n:204_8: Yo sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro asappāyo utu senāsanapaṭisevanena vinodetabbo hoti,
anya-e0101n:204_13: evamidhāpi niyataṃ utuparissayavinodanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:204_14: Atha vā ayaṃ vuttappakāro utu utuyeva.
anya-e0101n:204_19: Ye yattha apariguttiyā ca asappāyarūpadassanādinā ca ābādhaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0101n:204_20: taṃ senāsanaṃ evaṃ jānitvā paccavekkhitvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso senāsanaṃ utuparissayavinodanatthaṃ paṭisevatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:205_5: yaṃkiñci gilānassa sappāyaṃ bhisakkakammaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:205_6: Parikkhāroti pana “sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhataṃ hotī”ti ādīsu parivāro vuccati.
anya-e0101n:205_9: “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”ti ādīsu sambhāro.
anya-e0101n:205_16: Evaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjañca taṃ parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro.
anya-e0101n:205_18: Gilānassa yaṃkiñci sappāyaṃ bhisakkānuññātaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādi jīvitaparikkhāranti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:205_26: Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti tāvāti attho.
anya-e0101n:206_0: Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato paṭisaṅkhā yoniso paccayaparibhogalakkhaṇaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:206_2: cīvarādayo hi yasmā te paṭicca nissāya paribhuñjamānā pāṇino ayanti pavattanti,
anya-e0101n:208_1: Evametasmiṃ catubbidhe sīle saddhāya pātimokkhasaṃvaro sampādetabbo.
anya-e0101n:208_5: Tasmā yathā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ anavasesaṃ saddhāya samādiyitvā jīvitepi apekkhaṃ akarontena sādhukaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:213_1: “evameva kho pahārāda yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:213_3: Imasmiṃ ca panatthe aṭaviyaṃ corehi baddhatherānaṃ vatthūni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n:214_0: Mahāvattaniaṭaviyaṃ kira theraṃ corā kāḷavallīhi bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ.
anya-e0101n:214_1: Thero yathānipannova sattadivasāni vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇitvā tattheva kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
anya-e0101n:215_0: Aparampi theraṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe pūtilatāya bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ.
anya-e0101n:215_1: So vanadāhe āgacchante valliṃ acchinditvāva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n:215_2: Dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ āgacchanto disvā therassa sarīraṃ jhāpetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0101n:218_6: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:218_7: na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”ti ādinā nayena ādittapariyāyaṃ samanussaritvā
anya-e0101n:218_8: rūpādīsu visayesu cakkhudvārādipavattassa viññāṇassa abhijjhādīhi anvāssavanīyaṃ nimittādiggāhaṃ asammuṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n:218_10: Evaṃ asampādite hi etasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi anaddhaniyaṃ hoti aciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
anya-e0101n:225_0: Sampādite pana tasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi addhaniyaṃ hoti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
anya-e0101n:231_0: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:233_1: tasmā uppannaṃ rāgaṃ asubhamanasikārena vinodetvā indriyasaṃvaro sampādetabbo,
anya-e0101n:234_0: Therassa kira adhunāpabbajitassa piṇḍāya carato ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā rāgo uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:241_0: “Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato no ca attato;
anya-e0101n:243_1: Apica indriyasaṃvarapūrakena bhikkhunā kuraṇḍakamahāleṇavāsinā cittaguttattherena viya corakamahāvihāravāsinā mahāmittattherena viya ca bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:243_2: Kuraṇḍakamahāleṇe kira sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ abhinikkhamanacittakammaṃ manoramaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0101n:243_3: sambahulā bhikkhū senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā cittakammaṃ disvā “manoramaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:243_6: vassāni leṇe vasantassa cittakammaṃ atthītipi na jānāmi,
anya-e0101n:243_8: Therena kira ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vasantena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā leṇaṃ na ullokitapubbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:243_11: Anusaṃvaccharaṃ bhūmiyaṃ kesaranipātaṃ disvāvassa pupphitabhāvaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0101n:244_0: Rājā therassa guṇasampattiṃ sutvā vanditukāmo tikkhattuṃ pesetvā anāgacchante there tasmiṃ gāme taruṇaputtānaṃ
anya-e0101n:244_1: itthīnaṃ thane bandhāpetvā lañjāpesi “tāva dārakā thaññaṃ mā labhiṃsu,
anya-e0101n:244_5: theraṃ pavesetha sīlāni gaṇhissāmī”ti antepuraṃ abhiharāpetvā vanditvā bhojetvā “ajja, bhante,
anya-e0101n:244_7: sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmīti therassa pattaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ anugantvā deviyā saddhiṃ vanditvā nivatti.
anya-e0101n:244_8: Thero rājā vā vandatu devī vā,
anya-e0101n:244_13: tumhe raññepi vandamāne deviyāpi vandamānāya “sukhī hotu,
anya-e0101n:244_16: rājāti vā devīti vā vavatthānaṃ karomī”ti vatvā sattāhātikkamena “therassa idha vāso dukkho”ti raññā
anya-e0101n:244_17: vissajjito kuraṇḍakamahāleṇaṃ gantvā rattibhāge caṅkamaṃ ārūhi.
anya-e0101n:244_18: Nāgarukkhe adhivatthā devatā daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n:244_20: Thero “kiṃ nu me ajja kammaṭṭhānaṃ ativiya pakāsatī”ti attamano majjhimayāmasamanantaraṃ sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n:246_0: Bālo viya ca utrasto, na bhave lolalocano.
anya-e0101n:249_4: bhātu santikaṃ gantvā mama aphāsukabhāvaṃ ārocetvā bhesajjamāharā”ti.
anya-e0101n:249_10: tato paṭṭhāya na mayā lobhasahagatena cittena indriyāni bhinditvā visabhāgarūpaṃ olokitapubbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:249_11: iminā saccavacanena mātuyā me phāsu hotu,
anya-e0101n:249_12: gaccha idaṃ vatvā upāsikāya sarīraṃ parimajjā”ti.
anya-e0101n:249_13: Sā gantvā imamatthaṃ ārocetvā tathā akāsi.
anya-e0101n:249_14: Upāsikāya taṃkhaṇaṃyeva gaṇḍo pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyitvā antaradhāyi,
anya-e0101n:249_16: kasmā mama puttasadisassa bhikkhuno jālavicitrena hatthena sīsaṃ na parāmaseyyā”ti attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi. Tasmā –
anya-e0101n:252_4: Tasmā anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ pahāya vīriyena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi sammā esanāhi esā sampādetabbā parisuddhuppādeyeva
anya-e0101n:252_5: paccaye paṭisevamānena aparisuddhuppāde āsīvise viya parivajjayatā.
anya-e0101n:252_7: dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannānaṃ gihīnaṃ santikā uppannā paccayā parisuddhuppādā nāma.
anya-e0101n:252_9: Pariggahitadhutaṅgassa piṇḍapātacariyādīhi dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānaṃ santikā dhutaṅganiyamānulomena uppannā parisuddhuppādā nāma.
anya-e0101n:252_10: Ekabyādhivūpasamatthañcassa pūtihariṭakīcatumadhuresu uppannesu “catumadhuraṃ aññepi sabrahmacārino paribhuñjissantī”ti
anya-e0101n:252_11: cintetvā hariṭakīkhaṇḍameva paribhuñjamānassa dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ patirūpaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:252_14: tesu yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ājīvaṃ parisodhentassa cīvare ca piṇḍapāte ca nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo na vaṭṭanti.
anya-e0101n:252_16: Tattha nimittaṃ nāma senāsanatthaṃ bhūmiparikammādīni karontassa “kiṃ, bhante, kariyati,
anya-e0101n:252_17: ko kārāpetī”ti gihīhi vutte “na koci”ti paṭivacanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:252_19: Obhāso nāma “upāsakā tumhe kuhiṃ vasathā”ti. Pāsāde, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n:252_20: “Bhikkhūnaṃ pana upāsakā pāsādo na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:252_25: Tathā uppannaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ roge vūpasante paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n:254_0: Yo pana bhagavatā anuññātāpi nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo akaronto appicchatādiguṇeyeva nissāya jīvitakkhayepi
anya-e0101n:255_0: So kirāyasmā ekasmiṃ samaye pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ aññatarasmiṃ araññe viharati,
anya-e0101n:255_1: athassa ekasmiṃ divase udaravātābādho uppajjitvā atidukkhaṃ janesi.
anya-e0101n:255_2: Mahāmoggallānatthero sāyanhasamaye tassāyasmato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato theraṃ nipannaṃ disvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā “pubbe te, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:255_9: sace mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā puññaṃ atthi,
anya-e0101n:256_0: Imaṃ pana nesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā sutvā “sve ayyassa pāyāsaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:256_1: tāvadeva therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā jeṭṭhaputtassa sarīraṃ āvisitvā pīḷaṃ janesi.
anya-e0101n:256_3: “sace sve therassa evarūpaṃ nāma pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetha,
anya-e0101n:256_5: Te “tayā avuttepi mayaṃ therānaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ demā”ti vatvā dutiyadivase tathārūpaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādiyiṃsu.
anya-e0101n:257_2: tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n:257_3: Te manussā paccuggantvā therassa pattaṃ gahetvā vuttappakārassa pāyāsassa pūretvā adaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:257_6: aparampi dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:257_10: kathaṃ nu kho uppanno”ti cintento tassa uppattimūlaṃ disvā āha –
anya-e0101n:257_13: Sopāyasmā “mādisena nāma ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ na paribhuñjatī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā ekavacaneneva pattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā ekamante nikujjesi.
anya-e0101n:257_14: Pāyāsassa saha bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhānā therassa ābādho antaradhāyi,
anya-e0101n:257_15: tato paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsa vassāni na puna uppajji.
anya-e0101n:257_17: vacīviññattiṃ nissāya uppanno pāyāso antesu nikkhamitvā bhūmiyaṃ carantesupi paribhuñjituṃ ayuttarūpo”ti.
anya-e0101n:259_0: Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ, sājīvo garahito mama.
anya-e0101n:267_4: Tasmā pahāya paccayagedhaṃ dhammena samena uppanne paccaye yathāvuttena vidhinā paññāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantena sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:268_2: Paṭilābhakālepi hi dhātuvasena vā paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhitvā ṭhapitāni cīvarādīni tato uttari paribhuñjantassa anavajjova paribhogo,
anya-e0101n:269_4: Tatra saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma.
anya-e0101n:269_13: Evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti,
anya-e0101n:269_14: paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
anya-e0101n:270_7: Tañhi “na puna evaṃ karissāmī”ti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato saṃvarasuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:270_9: Tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā pariyeṭṭhisuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:270_11: Tañhi vuttappakārena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato paccavekkhaṇasuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:270_12: Tena vuttaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
anya-e0101n:271_2: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0101n:271_5: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti,
anya-e0101n:272_1: Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0101n:273_0: Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:273_4: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā hoti,
anya-e0101n:273_6: Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:273_7: Imesu pana paribhogesu yasmā sāmiparibhogo aggo,
anya-e0101n:273_8: tasmā taṃ patthayamānena bhikkhunā vuttappakārāya paccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantena paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:288_0: Imassa ca paccayasannissitasīlassa paripūrakāritāya bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:288_1: So hi sammā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñji. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:290_0: Mā heva tvaṃ sāmaṇera, jivhaṃ jhāpesi asaññato.
anya-e0101n:300_7: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ kusaladhamme yuttānaṃ sekkhapariyante paripūrakārīnaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ pariccattajīvitānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:300_13: Tathāgatasāvakānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:301_0: Tattha anupasampannānaṃ sīlaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā pariyantapārisuddhisīlanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:306_0: Evaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi anavasesavasena samādānabhāvañca lābhayasañātiaṅgajīvitavasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvañca
anya-e0101n:307_0: “Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
anya-e0101n:308_0: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti. –
anya-e0101n:309_0: Imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto jīvitasaṃsayepi sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamma tadeva apariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ
anya-e0101n:309_1: nissāya upāsakassa piṭṭhigatova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:310_0: “Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0101n:314_0: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ sīlaṃ upasampadato paṭṭhāya sudhotajātimaṇi viya suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya
anya-e0101n:314_1: ca atiparisuddhattā cittuppādamattakenapi malena virahitaṃ arahattasseva padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:315_0: Mahāsaṅgharakkhitattheraṃ kira atikkantasaṭṭhivassaṃ maraṇamañce nipannaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho lokuttarādhigamaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0101n:315_3: tumhe parinibbutāti samantā dvādasayojanā manussā sannipatitā,
anya-e0101n:315_4: tumhākaṃ puthujjanakālakiriyāya mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatī”ti. Āvuso,
anya-e0101n:315_5: ahaṃ “metteyyaṃ bhagavantaṃ passissāmī”ti na vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ.
anya-e0101n:315_6: Tena hi maṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ karohīti.
anya-e0101n:315_8: Thero tassa saha nikkhamanāva arahattaṃ patvā accharikāya saññaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0101n:315_10: evarūpe maraṇakāle lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentā dukkaraṃ karitthā”ti.
anya-e0101n:315_13: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya asatiyā aññāṇapakataṃ kammaṃ nāma na passāmī”ti.
anya-e0101n:317_0: Ubhayena naṃ garahanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n:319_0: Sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti, tassa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n:321_0: Sīlato naṃ garahanti, nāssa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n:323_0: Ubhayena naṃ pasaṃsanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n:327_1: puthujjanānaṃ vā pana rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhasīlaṃ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhīti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:327_3: So hi āyasmā tathārūpaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya arahatte patiṭṭhātukāmo verike āha –
anya-e0101n:332_0: Aññataropi mahāthero bāḷhagilāno sahatthā āhārampi paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto sake muttakarīse palipanno samparivattati,
anya-e0101n:332_1: taṃ disvā aññataro daharo “aho dukkhā jīvitasaṅkhārā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:332_5: imaṃ pana sīlaṃ bhinditvā laddhasampatti nāma sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭiladdhagihibhāvasadisī”ti vatvā
anya-e0101n:332_6: “sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmī”ti tattheva nipanno tameva rogaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0101n:339_0: “Dhiratthu maṃ āturaṃ pūtikāyaṃ, duggandhiyaṃ asuci byādhidhammaṃ;
anya-e0101n:340_0: Yatthappamattā adhimucchitā pajā, hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:341_0: Arahantādīnaṃ pana sīlaṃ sabbadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā parisuddhattā paṭippassaddhipārisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:343_0: Dutiyapañcake pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pahānādivasena attho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
anya-e0101n:344_50: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ, veramaṇī, cetanā, saṃvaro,
anya-e0101n:344_64: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0101n:345_0: Ettha ca pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ anuppādamattato.
anya-e0101n:345_1: Yasmā pana taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena upadhāraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:345_3: Tasmā pubbe vutteneva upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:345_4: Itare cattāro dhammā tato tato veramaṇivasena,
anya-e0101n:345_7: taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassa avītikkamanavasena ca cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0101n:348_6: So pana khaṇḍādibhāvo lābhayasādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca saṅgahito.
anya-e0101n:349_0: Tathā hi yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:349_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n:349_3: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n:349_5: tassa piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n:349_7: tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n:349_8: Evaṃ tāva lābhādihetukena bhedena khaṇḍādibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0101n:351_1: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n:351_2: apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ parimaddanaṃ nhāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
anya-e0101n:351_9: aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena,
anya-e0101n:352_2: paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0101n:352_4: Apica kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati,
anya-e0101n:353_2: na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0101n:353_4: Napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati.
anya-e0101n:353_5: Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
anya-e0101n:354_6: Apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭā vā tiropākārā vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
anya-e0101n:355_7: Apica kho yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
anya-e0101n:356_4: napi yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
anya-e0101n:356_6: Apica kho passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:357_3: napi passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0101n:357_5: Apica kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā
anya-e0101n:357_6: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
anya-e0101n:358_0: Evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca khaṇḍādibhāvo saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:359_3: aparāya ca “kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sātheyyaṃ thambho sārambho māno atimāno mado pamādo”tiādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ anuppattiyā,
anya-e0101n:360_0: Yāni hi sīlāni lābhādīnampi atthāya abhinnāni,
anya-e0101n:360_2: methunasaṃyogehi vā kodhupanāhādīhi vā pāpadhammehi anupahatāni,
anya-e0101n:360_3: tāni sabbaso akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0101n:360_7: upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni ca honti.
anya-e0101n:361_0: Taṃ panetaṃ vodānaṃ dvīhākārehi sampajjati sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena,
anya-e0101n:361_4: ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā”ti evamādisuttanayena sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:362_0: Apica dussīlo puggalo dussīlyahetu amanāpo hoti devamanussānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:362_4: tāya ca pana dussīlyatāya sāṇasāṭako viya dubbaṇṇo hoti.
anya-e0101n:362_11: Bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantopi abhikkhuyeva gogaṇaṃ anubandhagadrabho viya.
anya-e0101n:362_14: Sutādiguṇayuttopi sabrahmacārīnaṃ apūjāraho susānaggi viya brāhmaṇānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:363_1: hadayasantāpaṃ janayitvā uṇhalohituggārappavattanasamatthaṃ atikaṭukaṃ dukkhaṃ dassento sabbākārena paccakkhakammavipāko
anya-e0101n:364_2: amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūta’nti? Evaṃ, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n:364_5: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
anya-e0101n:364_6: yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ vā brāhmaṇakaññaṃ vā gahapatikaññaṃ vā mudutalunahatthapādaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vāti. Etadeva, bhante,
anya-e0101n:364_16: yathā etadeva tassa varaṃ dussīlassa pāpadhammassa asucisaṅkassarasamācārassa paṭicchannakammantassa
anya-e0101n:364_17: assamaṇassa samaṇapaṭiññassa abrahmacārissa brahmacāripaṭiññassa antopūtikassa avassutassa kasambujātassa
anya-e0101n:364_23: maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:364_24: na tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:365_0: Evaṃ aggikkhandhupamāya itthipaṭibaddhapañcakāmaguṇaparibhogapaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā eteneva upāyena –
anya-e0101n:366_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso daḷhāya vāḷarajjuyā ubho jaṅghā veṭhetvā ghaṃseyya,
anya-e0101n:366_9: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā abhivādanaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:367_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tiṇhāya sattiyā teladhotāya paccorasmiṃ pahareyya,
anya-e0101n:367_3: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā añjalikammaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:368_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayopaṭṭena ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena kāyaṃ sampaliveṭheyya,
anya-e0101n:368_3: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:369_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayosaṅkunā ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena mukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:369_3: vivaritvā tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ mukhe pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n:369_4: taṃ tassa oṭṭhampi ḍaheyya, mukhampi, jivhampi,
anya-e0101n:369_9: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:370_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso sīse vā gahetvā khandhe vā gahetvā tattaṃ ayomañcaṃ vā ayopīṭhaṃ
anya-e0101n:370_3: vā ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ abhinisīdāpeyya vā abhinipajjāpeyya vā,
anya-e0101n:370_5: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:371_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya ayokumbhiyā pakkhipeyya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya,
anya-e0101n:371_3: so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:371_7: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ vihāraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti cāti.
anya-e0101n:385_0: Dussīlassa vihāre, saddhādeyyamhi kā nivāsa rati;
anya-e0101n:388_0: Antopūtīti ca yaṃ, nindanto āha lokagaru.
anya-e0101n:391_0: Gūthaṃ viya kuṇapaṃ viya, maṇḍanakāmā vivajjayantīdha;
anya-e0101n:392_0: Yaṃ nāma sīlavanto, santo kiṃ jīvitaṃ tassa.
anya-e0101n:395_0: Karuṇāya vatthubhūto, kāruṇikajanassa nāma ko añño;
anya-e0101n:396_0: Dussīlasamo dussī, latāya iti bahuvidhā dosāti.
anya-e0101n:397_0: Evamādinā paccavekkhaṇena sīlavipattiyaṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ vuttappakāraviparītato sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsadassanañca veditabbaṃ. Apica –
anya-e0101n:399_0: Pabbajjā saphalā tassa, yassa sīlaṃ sunimmalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:405_0: Karoti api devānaṃ, sīlagandhe kathāva kā.
anya-e0101n:412_0: Yā manussesu sampatti, yā ca devesu sampadā;
anya-e0101n:413_0: Na sā sampannasīlassa, icchato hoti dullabhā.
anya-e0101n:418_0: Evañhi vibhāvayato sīlavipattito ubbijjitvā sīlasampattininnaṃ mānasaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:418_1: Tasmā yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ imañca sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ disvā sabbādarena sīlaṃ vodāpetabbanti.
anya-e0101n:419_0: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sīlaṃ tāva paridīpitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:423_1: Idāni yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:423_2: te guṇe sampādetuṃ yasmā samādinnasīlena yoginā dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:423_5: Iti anavajjasīlabbataguṇaparisuddhasabbasamācāro porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhāya catutthassa bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0101n:424_0: Bhagavatā hi pariccattalokāmisānaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃyeva ārādhetukāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ terasadhutaṅgāni anuññātāni.
anya-e0101n:429_1: Tattha atthatoti tāva rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṃ yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:429_2: atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:429_8: Tasmā yena samādānena so paṃsukūliko hoti,
anya-e0101n:430_0: Eteneva nayena saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātaṃ ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti tecīvariko.
anya-e0101n:431_1: parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:431_2: Taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko.
anya-e0101n:433_0: Ekāsane bhojanaṃ ekāsanaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti ekāsaniko. Tassa aṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:434_0: Dutiyabhājanassa paṭikkhittattā kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte piṇḍo pattapiṇḍo.
anya-e0101n:434_1: Idāni pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā pattapiṇḍo sīlamassāti pattapiṇḍiko.
anya-e0101n:435_1: Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ nāma,
anya-e0101n:435_3: tasmiṃ pacchābhattabhojane pacchābhattasaññaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ sīlamassāti pacchābhattiko.
anya-e0101n:435_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ khalūti eko sakuṇo.
anya-e0101n:435_7: So mukhena phalaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ patite puna aññaṃ na khādati.
anya-e0101n:436_0: Araññe nivāso sīlamassāti āraññiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ āraññikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:438_1: idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:439_0: Sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṃ sīlamassāti nesajjiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ nesajjikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:440_0: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n:440_1: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesanti dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n:440_2: Atha vā dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n:442_0: Samādānavidhānatotiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbāneva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavatova santike samādātabbāni.
anya-e0101n:442_12: tasmimpi asati cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena viya samādātabbāni,
anya-e0101n:442_14: Ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve bhātikattherānaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:444_3: paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesu dvīsu vacanesu aññatarena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:445_22: sāmuddiyantietesu aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ gahetvā phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya thiraṭṭhānāni dhovitvā cīvaraṃ
anya-e0101n:446_5: Tissāmaccamātā kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamalaṃ puñchāpetvā paṃsukūlikā gaṇhissantīti tālaveḷimagge chaḍḍāpesi.
anya-e0101n:446_7: Nhānacoḷanti yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sasīsaṃ nhāpitā kāḷakaṇṇicoḷanti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti.
anya-e0101n:447_1: Gatapaccāgatanti yaṃ manussā susānaṃ gantvā paccāgatā nhatvā chaḍḍenti.
anya-e0101n:447_6: Dhajāhaṭanti nāvaṃ ārohantā dhajaṃ bandhitvā ārūhanti.
anya-e0101n:447_9: taṃ dvinnampi senānaṃ gatakāle gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.

anya-e0101n:637_6: Imāni pana tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n:637_7: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgametesanti dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n:637_8: Atha vā dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:637_9: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n:637_13: Nāpi akusalaṃ cīvaraloluppādīni ceva niddhunāti paṭipattiyā ca aṅgaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:638_2: Asantaṃ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṃ nāma bhavissati.
anya-e0101n:638_3: Dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0101n:638_4: tasmā taṃ na gahetabba”nti ayaṃ tāva kusalattikato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:640_0: Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
anya-e0101n:641_0: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo,
anya-e0101n:642_0: Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni,
anya-e0101n:642_5: Yo pana na dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni,
anya-e0101n:642_6: kevalaṃ aññe dhutaṅgena ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero viya,
anya-e0101n:642_8: “tayidaṃ āyasmā upanando sakyaputto na dhuto dhutavādo”ti.
anya-e0101n:642_10: ayaṃ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n:642_11: “tayidaṃ āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo”ti.
anya-e0101n:642_13: ayaṃ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n:642_14: “tayidaṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhuto ceva dhutavādo cāti.
anya-e0101n:643_4: idamatthitāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārakā pañca dhammā “appicchataṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma,
anya-e0101n:643_5: tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho.
anya-e0101n:643_6: Sallekhatā ca pavivekatā ca dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ca amohe ca.
anya-e0101n:643_10: Alobhena ca anuññātānaṃ paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṃ kāmasukhānuyogaṃ,
anya-e0101n:643_11: amohena dhutaṅgesu atisallekhamukhena pavattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dhunāti.
anya-e0101n:644_0: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n:645_0: Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti rāgacaritassa ceva mohacaritassa ca. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:645_1: Dhutaṅgasevanā hi dukkhāpaṭipadā ceva sallekhavihāro ca.
anya-e0101n:645_5: Tattha hissa asaṅghaṭṭiyamānassa viharato dosopi vūpasammatīti ayaṃ dhutādīnaṃ vibhāgato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:646_0: Samāsabyāsatoti imāni pana dhutaṅgāni samāsato tīṇi sīsaṅgāni,
anya-e0101n:646_7: Abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ rakkhantassa kiṃ atthi rukkhamūlikaṅgayathāsanthatikaṅgesu rakkhitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0101n:646_13: sosānikaṅganti imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni cāti aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0101n:648_0: Puna sabbāneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitāni dvādasa,
anya-e0101n:648_3: Yassa hi dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n:649_0: Evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavasena duvidhānipi sabbāneva cetanāvasena ekavidhāni honti.
anya-e0101n:650_5: Sace pana abbhokāse āraññikaṅgasampannaṃ susānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:650_6: ekopi bhikkhu ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n:650_7: Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana āraññikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgañca dvepi sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittāni,
anya-e0101n:650_11: Bhikkhuniyā hi dutiyikaṃ vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:650_12: Evarūpe ca ṭhāne samānacchandā dutiyikā dullabhā.
anya-e0101n:650_16: Evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pañca hāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭheva hontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n:650_17: Yathāvuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ sesāni dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:650_20: pattapiṇḍikaṅganti imāni dve patirūpāni ceva sakkā ca paribhuñjitunti dve dhutaṅgānīti evaṃ byāsato dvecattālīsa hontīti ayaṃ samāsabyāsato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:651_0: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge
anya-e0101n:651_1: yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:655_1: Idāni yasmā evaṃ dhutaṅgapariharaṇasampāditehi appicchatādīhi guṇehi pariyodāte imasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitena “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño,
anya-e0101n:655_2: cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti vacanato cittasīsena niddiṭṭho samādhi bhāvetabbo.
anya-e0101n:655_3: So ca atisaṅkhepadesitattā viññātumpi tāva na sukaro,
anya-e0101n:655_5: tasmā tassa vitthārañca bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:657_2: Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ ārabbhamānaṃ vissajjanaṃ adhippetañceva atthaṃ na sādheyya,
anya-e0101n:658_2: Ekārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā ca ādhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:658_4: Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0101n:659_0: Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha pana avikkhepalakkhaṇo samādhi,
anya-e0101n:659_3: “Sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato pana sukhamassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:660_7: tathā parittaparittārammaṇādivasena catujhānaṅgavasena hānabhāgiyādivasena kāmāvacarādivasena adhipativasena ca.
anya-e0101n:662_1: Duvidhakoṭṭhāse channaṃ anussatiṭṭhānānaṃ maraṇassatiyā upasamānussatiyā āhāre paṭikūlasaññāya catudhātuvavatthānassāti
anya-e0101n:662_5: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti ādivacanato pana yā parikammānantarā ekaggatā,
anya-e0101n:663_0: Dutiyaduke tīsu bhūmīsu kusalacittekaggatā lokiyo samādhi.
anya-e0101n:663_1: Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā lokuttaro samādhīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho.
anya-e0101n:664_0: Tatiyaduke catukkanaye dvīsu pañcakanaye tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā sappītiko samādhi.
anya-e0101n:664_1: Avasesesu dvīsu jhānesu ekaggatā nippītiko samādhi.
anya-e0101n:665_0: Catutthaduke catukkanaye tīsu pañcakanaye catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n:667_2: subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti evaṃ hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:668_2: Yo hi vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ disvā vicāre adisvā kevalaṃ vitakkappahānamattaṃ ākaṅkhamāno paṭhamajjhānaṃ atikkamati,
anya-e0101n:668_5: Catukkanaye pana dutiyādīsu pañcakanaye tatiyādīsu tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā avitakkāvicāro samādhīti evaṃ savitakkasavicārādivasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:669_0: Tatiyattike catukkanaye ādito dvīsu pañcakanaye ca tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā pītisahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n:669_1: Tesveva tatiye ca catutthe ca jhāne ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n:669_3: Upacārasamādhi pana pītisukhasahagato vā hoti upekkhāsahagato vāti evaṃ pītisahagatādivasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:670_2: Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā appamāṇo samādhīti evaṃ parittamahaggatappamāṇavasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:672_0: Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke atthi samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño,
anya-e0101n:673_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:673_4: Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti,
anya-e0101n:673_7: Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā hoti mandā asīghappavatti.
anya-e0101n:674_0: Tattha yāni parato sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni ca vaṇṇayissāma,
anya-e0101n:674_2: tassa dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti.
anya-e0101n:674_3: Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
anya-e0101n:674_4: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
anya-e0101n:674_5: pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī,
anya-e0101n:674_7: Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanamanuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti.
anya-e0101n:674_9: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti.
anya-e0101n:675_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:675_12: Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
anya-e0101n:675_14: Mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā.
anya-e0101n:676_0: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya ca abhiññāya samādhiṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0101n:676_1: tassa so samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiññoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:676_2: Esa nayo sesattayepīti evaṃ dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:677_4: Tattha yo samādhi appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:678_0: Tatiyacatukke vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhasamādhīnaṃ vasena pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:678_3: tato pahīnasukhaṃ upekkhāvedanāsahitassa samādhino vasena duvaṅgikaṃ catutthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:678_4: Iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī honti.
anya-e0101n:679_8: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā.
anya-e0101n:679_11: Nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhitā nibbedhabhāginī paññā”ti.
anya-e0101n:679_12: Tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi cattāro hontīti.
anya-e0101n:680_5: Tathā rūpāvacarādikusalacittekaggatā itare tayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:681_0: Chaṭṭhacatukke “chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0101n:681_5: vīmaṃsaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0101n:681_7: ayaṃ vuccati vīmaṃsāsamādhī”ti evaṃ adhipativasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:682_0: Pañcake yaṃ catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:682_2: vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiyanti evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañca jhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n:682_3: Tesaṃ aṅgabhūtā ca pañca samādhīti evaṃ pañcajhānaṅgavasena pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:683_1: Ko cassa saṃkileso kiṃ vodānanti ettha pana vissajjanaṃ vibhaṅge vuttameva.
anya-e0101n:683_4: Tattha “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā”ti iminā nayena hānabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:683_5: “Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti visesabhāginī paññā”ti iminā nayena visesabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:685_1: Kathaṃ bhāvetabboti ettha pana yo tāva ayaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhotiādīsu ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto,
anya-e0101n:685_3: Paññāya hi bhāvitāya so bhāvito hoti.
anya-e0101n:685_4: Tasmā taṃ sandhāya evaṃ bhāvetabboti na kiñci visuṃ vadāma.
anya-e0101n:686_1: so vuttanayena sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
anya-e0101n:686_2: taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0101n:686_3: aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena
anya-e0101n:686_4: khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0101n:687_1: yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
anya-e0101n:688_0: Āvāso ca kulaṃ lābho, gaṇo kammañca pañcamaṃ;
anya-e0101n:689_0: Addhānaṃ ñāti ābādho, gantho iddhīti te dasāti. –
anya-e0101n:690_0: Ime dasa palibodhā nāma. Tattha āvāsoyeva āvāsapalibodho. Esa nayo kulādīsu.
anya-e0101n:691_0: Tattha āvāsoti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi pariveṇaṃ sakalopi saṅghārāmo.
anya-e0101n:691_2: Yo panettha navakammādīsu ussukkaṃ vā āpajjati,
anya-e0101n:691_4: yena kenaci vā kāraṇena apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto,
anya-e0101n:692_1: dve kira kulaputtā anurādhapurā nikkhamitvā anupubbena thūpārāme pabbajiṃsu.
anya-e0101n:692_2: Tesu eko dve mātikā paguṇā katvā pañcavassiko hutvā pavāretvā pācinakhaṇḍarājiṃ nāma gato.
anya-e0101n:692_4: Pācinakhaṇḍarājigato tattha ciraṃ vasitvā thero hutvā cintesi “paṭisallānasāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:692_7: Pavisantaṃyeva ca naṃ disvā samānavassikatthero paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā vattaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0101n:692_8: Āgantukatthero senāsanaṃ pavisitvā cintesi “idāni me sahāyo sappiṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā pānakaṃ vā pesessati.
anya-e0101n:692_10: So rattiṃ aladdhā pāto cintesi “idāni upaṭṭhākehi gahitaṃ yāgukhajjakaṃ pesessatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:692_12: paviṭṭhassa maññe dassatī”ti pātova tena saddhiṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n:692_13: Te dve ekaṃ vīthiṃ caritvā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā piviṃsu.
anya-e0101n:692_15: bhattakāle idāni manussā paṇītaṃ bhattaṃ dassantī”ti,
anya-e0101n:692_16: tato bhattakālepi piṇḍāya caritvā laddhameva bhuñjitvā itaro āha – “kiṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:692_21: Thero nagarato dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamanto kumbhakāragāmamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
anya-e0101n:692_26: pācinakhaṇḍarājiyā vaṇṇaṃ abhāsīti? Kiṃ pana, bhante,
anya-e0101n:692_27: tumhākaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitaṭṭhāne na koci atirekaparikkhāro atthīti?
anya-e0101n:692_32: kattaradaṇḍo telanāḷi upāhanatthavikā ca tatthevāti. Tayāvuso,
anya-e0101n:692_33: ekadivasaṃ vasitvā ettakaṃ ṭhapitanti? Āma, bhante.
anya-e0101n:692_37: lohapāsāde sappāyaṃ dhammassavanaṃ mahācetiyadassanaṃ theradassanañca labbhati,
anya-e0101n:692_39: Idheva tumhe vasathā”ti dutiyadivase pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sayameva agamāsīti.
anya-e0101n:693_1: Ekaccassa hi upaṭṭhākakulampi “sukhitesu sukhito”tiādinā nayena saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato palibodho hoti,
anya-e0101n:693_2: so kulamānusakehi vinā dhammassavanāya sāmantavihārampi na gacchati.
anya-e0101n:694_1: Therabhaginīpi upāsikā sadā theraṃ tassa pavattiṃ pucchati.
anya-e0101n:694_2: Thero ekadivasaṃ daharaṃ ānessāmīti rohaṇābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0101n:694_4: upajjhāyaṃ dāni passitvā upāsikāya ca pavattiṃ ñatvā āgamissāmī”ti rohaṇato nikkhami.
anya-e0101n:694_6: So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle therassa vattaṃ katvā “kuhiṃ yāsī”ti pucchito tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
anya-e0101n:694_11: ahaṃ pana idheva imaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmīti taṃ uyyojesi.
anya-e0101n:695_1: amhākaṃ senāsanaṃ patta”nti pucchanto “āgantukassa daharassā”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha – “bhante,
anya-e0101n:695_2: amhākaṃ senāsane vassaṃ upagatassa vattaṃ atthī”ti.
anya-e0101n:695_4: Temāsaṃ amhākaṃyeva ghare bhikkhaṃ gahetvā pavāretvā gamanakāle āpucchitabbanti.
anya-e0101n:695_6: Upāsakopi gharaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ āvāse eko āgantuko ayyo upagato sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:695_7: Upāsikā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādesi.
anya-e0101n:696_0: So temāsampi tattha piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā vassaṃvuttho “ahaṃ gacchāmī”ti āpucchi.
anya-e0101n:696_2: gacchathā”ti dutiyadivase ghareyeva bhojetvā telanāḷiṃ pūretvā ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ navahatthañca sāṭakaṃ datvā “gacchatha,
anya-e0101n:697_0: Upajjhāyopissa pavāretvā paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto pubbe diṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva taṃ addasa.
anya-e0101n:697_1: So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle therassa vattaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0101n:697_5: bhante”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tena telena therassa pāde makkhetvā guḷena pānakaṃ katvā tampi sāṭakaṃ therasseva datvā theraṃ vanditvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:697_7: Theropi vihāraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase koraṇḍakagāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n:698_0: Upāsikāpi “mayhaṃ bhātā mama puttaṃ gahetvā idāni āgacchatī”ti sadā maggaṃ olokayamānāva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:698_1: Sā taṃ ekakameva āgacchantaṃ disvā “mato me maññe putto,
anya-e0101n:698_2: ayaṃ thero ekakova āgacchatī”ti therassa pādamūle nipatitvā paridevamānā rodi.
anya-e0101n:698_3: Thero “nūna daharo appicchatāya attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva gato”ti taṃ samassāsetvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā pattatthavikato taṃ sāṭakaṃ nīharitvā dasseti.
anya-e0101n:699_0: Upāsikā pasīditvā puttena gatadisābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā namassamānā āha –
anya-e0101n:699_1: “mayhaṃ puttasadisaṃ vata maññe bhikkhuṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā bhagavā rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0101n:699_5: Vijātamātuyā nāma gehe temāsaṃ bhuñjamānopi ‘ahaṃ putto tvaṃ mātā’ti na vakkhati,
anya-e0101n:700_2: Puññavantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagataṭṭhāne manussā mahāparivāre paccaye denti.
anya-e0101n:700_3: So tesaṃ anumodento dhammaṃ desento samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na okāsaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:700_7: asuko upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0101n:700_11: Tena gaṇaṃ pahāya yattha naṃ na jānanti,
anya-e0101n:701_1: yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā dento samaṇadhammassa okāsaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n:701_4: Sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu gahitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:701_9: yojanato paraṃ agantvā antoyojanaparicchede aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:701_12: tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni gacchathā”ti gaṇaṃ pahāya attano kammaṃ kattabbanti.
anya-e0101n:702_2: katākate ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti sabbadā palibodho hoti.
anya-e0101n:703_1: Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti,
anya-e0101n:703_3: Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ,
anya-e0101n:703_4: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodanīyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:703_5: tasmā gantvā taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbanti.
anya-e0101n:704_3: tasmā so palibodho upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
anya-e0101n:705_0: Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:705_7: Sacepi hi te rajje ṭhitā honti,
anya-e0101n:705_13: Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:705_14: Sace natthi attano santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ datvā pacchā labhantena gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:705_16: Aññātakassa bhaginisāmikassa bhesajjaṃ neva kātuṃ na dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:705_17: “Tuyhaṃ sāmikassa dehī”ti vatvā pana bhaginiyā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:705_19: Tesaṃ pana puttā imassa ñātakā evāti tesaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n:706_3: Sace pana katipāhaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontassapi na vūpasammati,
anya-e0101n:706_6: taṃyeva hi posento anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe dukkhaṃ pattoti attabhāvaṃ garahitvā samaṇadhammo kātabboti.
anya-e0101n:708_0: Majjhimabhāṇakadevatthero kira malayavāsidevattherassa santikaṃ gantvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ yāci.
anya-e0101n:708_8: tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekūnavīsativassāni sajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:708_9: akatvā vīsatime vasse arahattaṃ patvā sajjhāyatthāya āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “vīsati me, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:708_11: apica kho kataparicayo ahamettha ārabhathā”ti vatvā ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ekabyañjanepissa kaṅkhā nāhosi.
anya-e0101n:709_0: Karuḷiyagirivāsīnāgattheropi aṭṭhārasavassāni pariyattiṃ chaḍḍetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhātukathaṃ uddisi.
anya-e0101n:709_1: Tesaṃ gāmavāsikattherehi saddhiṃ saṃsandentānaṃ ekapañhopi uppaṭipāṭiyā āgato nāhosi.
anya-e0101n:710_0: Mahāvihārepi tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero nāma aṭṭhakathaṃ anuggahetvāva pañcanikāyamaṇḍale tīṇi piṭakāni parivattessāmīti suvaṇṇabheriṃ paharāpesi.
anya-e0101n:710_13: Puna so aññena aññena pariyāyena evaṃ vadanti bhanteti tikkhattuṃ āha.
anya-e0101n:710_16: ācariyamukhato pana anuggahitattā ‘evaṃ ācariyā vadantī’ti saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0101n:710_17: Gaccha attano ācariyānaṃ santike suṇāhī”ti. Kuhiṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:710_19: Gaṅgāya parato rohaṇajanapade tulādhārapabbatavihāre sabbapariyattiko mahādhammarakkhitatthero nāma vasati,
anya-e0101n:710_21: bhanteti theraṃ vanditvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
anya-e0101n:710_26: Avasesaṃ pana me tiṃsamattāni vassāni na olokitapubbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:710_27: Apica tvaṃ rattiṃ mama santike parivattehi.
anya-e0101n:710_28: Ahaṃ te divā kathayissāmīti. So sādhu,
anya-e0101n:710_30: Pariveṇadvāre mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā gāmavāsino divase divase dhammassavanatthāya āgacchanti.
anya-e0101n:710_32: Taṃ divā kathayanto anupubbena desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā abhayattherassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā “āvuso,
anya-e0101n:710_37: Tato naṃ thero añño esa, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:710_40: Athassa so kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā āgantvā lohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento thero parinibbutoti assosi.
anya-e0101n:710_46: So attano dhammantevāsikassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā ‘mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī’ti āha.
anya-e0101n:711_1: Sā hi uttānaseyyakadārako viya taruṇasassaṃ viya ca dupparihārā hoti.
anya-e0101n:711_7: itarena avasesāti ayaṃ tāva palibodhakathāya vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:713_1: Kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha pana duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānañca.
anya-e0101n:713_2: Tattha sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhikkhusaṅghādīsu mettā maraṇassati ca.
anya-e0101n:714_0: Kammaṭṭhānikena hi bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ tāva paricchinditvā sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhusaṅghe sukhitā hontu abyāpajjāti mettā bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0101n:714_4: So hi bhikkhusaṅghe mettāya sahavāsīnaṃ muducittataṃ janeti.
anya-e0101n:714_6: Sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu mettāya mudukatacittāhi devatāhi dhammikāya rakkhāya susaṃvihitarakkho hoti.
anya-e0101n:714_7: Gocaragāmamhi issarajane mettāya mudukatacittasantānehi issarehi dhammikāya rakkhāya surakkhitaparikkhāro hoti.
anya-e0101n:714_8: Tattha manussesu mettāya pasāditacittehi tehi aparibhūto hutvā vicarati.
anya-e0101n:714_10: Maraṇassatiyā pana avassaṃ mayā maritabbanti cintento anesanaṃ pahāya uparūpari vaḍḍhamānasaṃvego anolīnavuttiko hoti.
anya-e0101n:714_11: Asubhasaññāparicitacittassa panassa dibbānipi ārammaṇāni lobhavasena cittaṃ na pariyādiyanti.
anya-e0101n:715_0: Evaṃ bahūpakārattā sabbattha atthayitabbaṃ icchitabbanti ca adhippetassa yogānuyogakammassa ṭhānañcāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:716_0: Cattālīsāya pana kammaṭṭhānesu yaṃ yassa cariyānukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:716_1: taṃ tassa niccaṃ pariharitabbattā uparimassa ca uparimassa bhāvanākammassa padaṭṭhānattā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:716_2: Iti imaṃ duvidhampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yo deti,
anya-e0101n:718_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0101n:719_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojakoti. ;
anya-e0101n:720_0: Evamādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantena hitesiṃ vuddhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:721_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”ti ādivacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0101n:721_2: Tasmā tasmiṃ sati tasseva bhagavato santike gahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ sugahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:721_3: Parinibbute pana tasmiṃ asītiyā mahāsāvakesu yo dharati,
anya-e0101n:721_5: Tasmiṃ asati yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo hoti,
anya-e0101n:721_6: tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:722_0: Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavo ahaṃ khīṇāsavoti attānaṃ pakāsetīti?
anya-e0101n:722_3: Nanu assaguttatthero āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa bhikkhuno “kammaṭṭhānakārako aya”nti jānitvā ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ
anya-e0101n:722_4: paññāpetvā tattha pallaṅkena nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesīti.
anya-e0101n:723_4: Ekapiṭakadharepi asati yassa ekasaṅgītipi aṭṭhakathāya saddhiṃ paguṇā,
anya-e0101n:723_7: Evarūpo hi tantidharo vaṃsānurakkhako paveṇīpālako ācariyo ācariyamatikova hoti,
anya-e0101n:723_9: Teneva porāṇakattherā “lajjī rakkhissati lajjī rakkhissatī”ti tikkhattuṃ āhaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:724_0: Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo cettha attanā adhigatamaggameva ācikkhanti.
anya-e0101n:724_1: Bahussuto pana taṃ taṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uggahaparipucchānaṃ visodhitattā ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca
anya-e0101n:724_2: sallakkhetvā sappāyāsappāyaṃ yojetvā gahanaṭṭhāne gacchanto mahāhatthī viya mahāmaggaṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:724_4: Tasmā evarūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:725_5: Gacchantena ca na dhotamakkhitehi pādehi upāhanā ārūhitvā chattaṃ gahetvā telanāḷimadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā antevāsikaparivutena gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:725_6: Gamikavattaṃ pana pūretvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā antarāmagge yaṃ yaṃ vihāraṃ pavisati sabbattha
anya-e0101n:725_7: vattapaṭipattiṃ kurumānena sallahukaparikkhārena paramasallekhavuttinā hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:726_0: Taṃ vihāraṃ pavisantena antarāmaggeyeva dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā gahetvā pavisitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:726_1: na ca “muhuttaṃ vissametvā pādadhovanamakkhanādīni katvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:726_2: Sace hissa tatra ācariyassa visabhāgā bhikkhū bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n:726_3: te āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ācariyassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā “naṭṭhosi,
anya-e0101n:726_4: sace tassa santikaṃ āgato”ti vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n:726_6: tasmā ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā ujukaṃ tattheva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:727_7: “Pāde dhovāhī”ti vuttena na tāva pādā dhovitabbā.
anya-e0101n:727_8: Sace hi ācariyena ābhataṃ udakaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n:727_12: aññehi ābhata”nti vuttena pana yattha ācariyo na passati,
anya-e0101n:727_14: abbhokāse vihārassāpi vā ekamante nisīditvā pādā dhovitabbā.
anya-e0101n:728_0: Sace ācariyo telanāḷiṃ āharati uṭṭhahitvā ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetabbā.
anya-e0101n:728_2: “ayaṃ bhikkhu ito eva paṭṭhāya sambhogaṃ kopetī”ti ācariyassa aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0101n:728_3: Gahetvā pana na āditova pādā makkhetabbā.
anya-e0101n:728_4: Sace hi taṃ ācariyassa gattabbhañjanatelaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n:728_8: pādepi makkhehī”ti vuttena pana thokaṃ sīse katvā pāde makkhetvā “imaṃ telanāḷiṃ ṭhapemi,
anya-e0101n:729_2: Dutiyadivasato pana paṭṭhāya sace ācariyassa pakatiupaṭṭhāko atthi,
anya-e0101n:729_7: Sītaṃ uṇhanti duvidhaṃ mukhadhovanaudakañca nhānodakañca paṭiyādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:729_8: Tato yaṃ ācariyo tīṇi divasāni paribhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:729_10: Niyamaṃ akatvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā paribhuñjantassa yathāladdhaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:729_16: kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:729_20: bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā”ti ādikaṃ khandhake sammāvattaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:730_0: Evaṃ vattasampattiyā garuṃ ārādhayamānena sāyaṃ vanditvā yāhīti vissajjitena gantabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:730_5: dasāhe vā pakkhe vā vītivatte ekadivasaṃ vissajjitenāpi agantvā okāsaṃ kāretvā āgamanakāraṇaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:730_6: Akāle vā gantvā kimatthamāgatosīti puṭṭhena ārocetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:731_0: Sace panassa tāya velāya pittābādhena vā kucchi pariḍayhati,
anya-e0101n:731_3: taṃ yathābhūtaṃ āvikatvā attano sappāyavelaṃ ārocetvā tāya velāya upasaṅkamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:731_4: Asappāyavelāya hi vuccamānampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sakkā hoti manasikātunti.
anya-e0101n:731_5: Ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:733_1: Idāni attano cariyānukūlanti ettha cariyāti cha cariyā rāgacariyā,
anya-e0101n:733_7: Keci pana rāgādīnaṃ saṃsaggasannipātavasena aparāpi catasso,
anya-e0101n:733_8: tathā saddhādīnanti imāhi aṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cuddasa icchanti.
anya-e0101n:733_9: Evaṃ pana bhede vuccamāne rāgādīnaṃ saddhādīhipi saṃsaggaṃ katvā anekā cariyā honti,
anya-e0101n:733_10: tasmā saṅkhepena chaḷeva cariyā veditabbā. Cariyā, pakati,
anya-e0101n:733_12: Tāsaṃ vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti rāgacarito,
anya-e0101n:734_0: Tattha yasmā rāgacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye saddhā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0101n:734_2: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe rāgo siniddho nātilūkho,
anya-e0101n:735_0: Yasmā pana dosacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye paññā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0101n:735_2: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe doso nissineho na ārammaṇaṃ allīyati,
anya-e0101n:735_4: Yathā ca doso abhūtampi dosameva pariyesati,
anya-e0101n:736_0: Yasmā pana mohacaritassa anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya vāyamamānassa yebhuyyena antarāyakarā vitakkā uppajjanti,
anya-e0101n:737_0: Apare taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena aparāpi tisso cariyā vadanti.
anya-e0101n:737_2: māno ca taṃsampayuttoti tadubhayaṃ rāgacariyaṃ nātivattati.
anya-e0101n:737_3: Mohanidānattā ca diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhicariyā mohacariyameva anupatati.
anya-e0101n:739_0: Tatra purimā tāva tisso cariyā pubbāciṇṇanidānā,
anya-e0101n:739_6: Pubbe majjapānabahulo sutaparipucchāvihīno ca mohacarito hoti,
anya-e0101n:739_7: tiracchānayoniyā vā cavitvā idhūpapannoti evaṃ pubbāciṇṇanidānāti vadanti.
anya-e0101n:739_8: Dvinnaṃ pana dhātūnaṃ ussannattā puggalo mohacarito hoti pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca.
anya-e0101n:740_0: Tattha yasmā pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulāpi saggā cavitvā idhūpapannāpi ca na sabbe rāgacaritāyeva honti,
anya-e0101n:740_2: Evaṃ dhātūnañca yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:740_5: Saddhācariyādīsu ca ekissāpi nidānaṃ na vuttameva.
anya-e0101n:741_1: vuttañhetaṃ ussadakittane “ime sattā pubbahetuniyāmena lobhussadā dosussadā mohussadā alobhussadā adosussadā amohussadā ca honti.
anya-e0101n:742_0: Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti alobho mando,
anya-e0101n:742_2: tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0101n:742_3: Adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n:742_4: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti sukhasīlo akkodhano paññavā vajirūpamañāṇo.
anya-e0101n:743_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti alobhādosā mandā,
anya-e0101n:743_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca.
anya-e0101n:743_3: Paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
anya-e0101n:744_0: Yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n:744_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca,
anya-e0101n:745_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti alobhādayo mandā,
anya-e0101n:745_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
anya-e0101n:746_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n:746_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho appakileso hoti dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo,
anya-e0101n:747_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n:747_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti aduṭṭho sīlako ca,
anya-e0101n:748_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n:748_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca,
anya-e0101n:749_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādosāmohā balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā,
anya-e0101n:749_1: so purimanayeneva mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n:750_5: Yathā vā amohaparivārena kammunā nibbatto buddhicarito,
anya-e0101n:750_9: Evaṃ lobhādīsu aññataraññataraparivāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ cariyānaṃ nidānanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:751_0: 45. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ kathañca jānitabbaṃ ayaṃ puggalo rāgacaritotiādi. Tatrāyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0101n:754_0: Tattha iriyāpathatoti rāgacarito hi pakatigamanena gacchanto cāturiyena gacchati,
anya-e0101n:759_4: Rāgacarito ca ataramāno samaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
anya-e0101n:759_5: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca sīghaṃ avuṭṭhāya saṅkito viya saṇikaṃ paṭivacanaṃ deti.
anya-e0101n:759_6: Dosacarito taramāno yathā vā tathā vā seyyaṃ paññapetvā pakkhittakāyo bhākuṭiṃ katvā sayati,
anya-e0101n:759_7: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca sīghaṃ vuṭṭhāya kupito viya paṭivacanaṃ deti.
anya-e0101n:759_8: Mohacarito dussaṇṭhānaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā vikkhittakāyo bahulaṃ adhomukho sayati,
anya-e0101n:759_9: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca huṅkāraṃ karonto dandhaṃ vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:760_0: Kiccāti sammajjanādīsu ca kiccesu rāgacarito sādhukaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā ataramāno vālikaṃ avippakiranto
anya-e0101n:760_2: Dosacarito gāḷhaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā taramānarūpo ubhato vālikaṃ ussārento kharena saddena asuddhaṃ visamaṃ sammajjati.
anya-e0101n:760_3: Mohacarito sithilaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā samparivattakaṃ āḷolayamāno asuddhaṃ visamaṃ sammajjati.
anya-e0101n:761_4: Cīvaradhāraṇampi ca rāgacaritassa nātigāḷhaṃ nātisithilaṃ hoti pāsādikaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:762_1: bhuñjamāno ca nātimahantaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopaṃ katvā rasapaṭisaṃvedī ataramāno bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:762_2: kiñcideva ca sāduṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0101n:762_4: bhuñjamāno ca mukhapūrakaṃ ālopaṃ katvā arasapaṭisaṃvedī taramāno bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:762_5: kiñcideva ca asāduṃ labhitvā domanassaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0101n:762_7: bhuñjamāno ca aparimaṇḍalaṃ parittaṃ ālopaṃ katvā bhājane chaḍḍento mukhaṃ makkhento vikkhittacitto taṃ taṃ vitakkento bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n:763_0: Dassanāditoti rāgacarito īsakampi manoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā vimhayajāto viya ciraṃ oloketi,
anya-e0101n:763_4: Dosacarito īsakampi amanoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā kilantarūpo viya na ciraṃ oloketi,
anya-e0101n:763_8: Mohacarito yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ disvā parapaccayiko hoti,
anya-e0101n:764_6: Dosacaritassa kodho, upanāho, makkho, paḷāso, issā,
anya-e0101n:764_33: hurāhuraṃ dhāvanāti evamādayo dhammā bahulaṃ pavattantīti.
anya-e0101n:765_0: Yasmā pana idaṃ cariyāvibhāvanavidhānaṃ sabbākārena neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0101n:765_3: Rāgacaritassa hi vuttāni iriyāpathādīni dosacaritādayopi appamādavihārino kātuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0101n:765_4: Saṃsaṭṭhacaritassa ca puggalassa ekasseva bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayo na upapajjanti.
anya-e0101n:765_7: Vuttañhetaṃ “cetopariyañāṇassa lābhī ācariyo cariyaṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessati,
anya-e0101n:765_9: Tasmā cetopariyañāṇena vā taṃ vā puggalaṃ pucchitvā jānitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:766_1: Kiṃ caritassa puggalassa kiṃ sappāyanti ettha pana senāsanaṃ tāva rāgacaritassa adhotavedikaṃ bhūmaṭṭhakaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_2: akatapabbhārakaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ paṇṇasālādīnaṃ aññataraṃ rajokiṇṇaṃ jatukābharitaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ atiuccaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_3: vā atinīcaṃ vā ujjaṅgalaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ asucivisamamaggaṃ,
anya-e0101n:766_7: Nivāsanapārupanaṃ antacchinnaṃ olambavilambasuttakākiṇṇaṃ jālapūvasadisaṃ sāṇi viya kharasamphassaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ bhārikaṃ kicchapariharaṇaṃ sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:766_8: Pattopi dubbaṇṇo mattikāpatto vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato ayopatto vā garuko dussaṇṭhāno sīsakapālamiva jeguccho vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:766_10: Bhikkhācāragāmopi yattha manussā apassantā viya caranti,
anya-e0101n:766_12: bhante”ti āsanasālaṃ pavesetvā yāgubhattaṃ datvā gacchantā gāvī viya vaje pavesetvā anapalokentā gacchanti,
anya-e0101n:766_14: Parivisakamanussāpi dāsā vā kammakarā vā dubbaṇṇā duddasikā kiliṭṭhavasanā duggandhā jegucchā,
anya-e0101n:766_15: ye acittīkārena yāgubhattaṃ chaḍḍentā viya parivisanti,
anya-e0101n:766_17: Yāgubhattakhajjakampi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ sāmākakudrūsakakaṇājakādimayaṃ pūtitakkaṃ bilaṅgaṃ jiṇṇasākasūpeyyaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_19: Iriyāpathopissa ṭhānaṃ vā caṅkamo vā vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:766_20: Ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci aparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:767_0: Dosacaritassa senāsanaṃ nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ suvibhattabhittithambhasopānaṃ supariniṭṭhitamālākammalatākammanānāvidhacittakammasamujjalasamasiniddhamudubhūmitalaṃ
anya-e0101n:767_2: tattha tattha vāsatthāya nikkhittakusumavāsagandhasugandhaṃ yaṃ dassanamatteneva pītipāmojjaṃ janayati,
anya-e0101n:767_4: Tassa pana senāsanassa maggopi sabbaparissayavimutto sucisamatalo alaṅkatapaṭiyattova vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_8: tena tena ekapaṭṭaṃ vā dupaṭṭaṃ vā sallahukaṃ samaṇasāruppena surattaṃ suddhavaṇṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_9: Patto udakapupphuḷamiva susaṇṭhāno maṇi viya sumaṭṭho nimmalo samaṇasāruppena suparisuddhavaṇṇo ayomayo vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_10: Bhikkhācāramaggo parissayavimutto samo manāpo nātidūranāccāsannagāmo vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_11: Bhikkhācāragāmopi yattha manussā “idāni ayyo āgamissatī”ti sittasammaṭṭhe padese āsanaṃ paññāpetvā paccuggantvā
anya-e0101n:767_12: pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ sahatthā parivisanti,
anya-e0101n:767_14: Parivesakā panassa ye honti abhirūpā pāsādikā sunhātā suvilittā dhūpavāsakusumagandhasurabhino nānāvirāgasucimanuññavatthābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā
anya-e0101n:767_17: Yāgubhattakhajjakampi vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ ojavantaṃ manoramaṃ sabbākārapaṇītaṃ yāvadatthaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_18: Iriyāpathopissa seyyā vā nisajjā vā vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n:767_19: ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci suparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ dosacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:768_3: Ārammaṇaṃ panassa parittaṃ suppamattaṃ sarāvamattaṃ vā (khuddakaṃ) na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:768_6: Sesaṃ dosacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:770_0: Buddhicaritassa senāsanādīsu idaṃ nāma asappāyanti natthi.
anya-e0101n:771_0: Vitakkacaritassa senāsanaṃ vivaṭaṃ disāmukhaṃ yattha nisinnassa ārāmavanapokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakāni gāmanigamajanapadapaṭipāṭiyo
anya-e0101n:771_4: tasmā gambhīre darīmukhe vanappaṭicchanne hatthikucchipabbhāramahindaguhāsadise senāsane vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:772_0: Sesaṃ rāgacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ vitakkacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:772_1: Ayaṃ attano cariyānukūlanti ettha āgatacariyānaṃ pabhedanidānavibhāvanasappāyaparicchedato vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:772_2: Na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena āvikataṃ.
anya-e0101n:772_3: Tañhi anantarassa mātikāpadassa vitthāre sayameva āvibhavissati.
anya-e0101n:774_1: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha saṅkhātaniddesato,
anya-e0101n:774_8: cariyānukūlatoti imehi tāva dasahākārehi kammaṭṭhānavinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:775_0: Tattha saṅkhātaniddesatoti cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesūti hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:779_0: Mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā.
anya-e0101n:780_5: Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ saṅkhātaniddesato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:781_0: Upacārappanāvahatoti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiñca ānāpānassatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n:782_0: Jhānappabhedatoti appanāvahesu cettha ānāpānassatiyā saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇā catukkajjhānikā honti.
anya-e0101n:782_3: Catutthabrahmavihāro cattāro ca āruppā catutthajjhānikāti evaṃ jhānappabhedato.
anya-e0101n:783_0: Samatikkamatoti dve samatikkamā aṅgasamatikkamo ca ārammaṇasamatikkamo ca.
