anya-e0101n:783_1: Tattha sabbesupi tikacatukkajjhānikesu kammaṭṭhānesu aṅgasamatikkamo hoti vitakkavicārādīni jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0101n:783_4: Sopi hi mettādīnaṃyeva ārammaṇe somanassaṃ samatikkamitvā pattabboti.
anya-e0101n:783_6: Purimesu hi navasu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:784_0: Vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanatoti imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:784_2: tadabbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sotuṃ dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni passituṃ parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0101n:784_3: Kāyagatāsati pana asubhāni ca na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:784_5: Sā ca nesaṃ okāsena paricchinnatā bhāvanānaye āvibhavissati.
anya-e0101n:784_10: Tatra hi nimittavaḍḍhanavasena rūpasaññā vibhūtāti vuttā.
anya-e0101n:785_3: Yatheva hi dhammāsokakāle karavīkasakuṇo samantā ādāsabhittīsu attano chāyaṃ disvā sabbadisāsu karavīkasaññī hutvā madhuraṃ giraṃ nicchāresi,
anya-e0101n:785_4: evaṃ theropi aṭṭhikasaññāya lābhittā sabbadisāsu upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ passanto kevalāpi pathavī aṭṭhikabharitāti cintesīti.
anya-e0101n:786_0: Yadi evaṃ yā asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā vuttā,
anya-e0101n:786_3: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n:786_5: Iminā pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:786_7: Yo vā etaṃ vaḍḍhane ādīnavaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0101n:787_2: Tesu hi ānāpānanimittaṃ tāva vaḍḍhayato vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n:787_4: Iti sādīnavattā okāsena ca paricchinnattā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:787_9: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”ti ādi,
anya-e0101n:787_11: Ekāvāsadviāvāsādinā hi anukkamena ekissā disāya satte pariggahetvā bhāvento ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvāti vutto.
anya-e0101n:787_18: Tato paraṃ vaḍḍhayatopi na kiñci hoti.
anya-e0101n:787_26: tasmā taṃ na vaḍḍhetabbanti evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato.
anya-e0101n:788_0: Ārammaṇatoti imesu ca cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasakasiṇā,
anya-e0101n:788_5: Tathā dasasu anussatīsu ṭhapetvā ānāpānassatiñca kāyagatāsatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n:788_22: yañca ālokakasiṇe sūriyādīnaṃ obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇanti imāni aṭṭha calitārammaṇāni,
anya-e0101n:789_2: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imāni dvādasa devesu nappavattanti.
anya-e0101n:789_4: ānāpānassati cāti imāni terasa brahmaloke nappavattanti.
anya-e0101n:789_5: Arūpabhave pana ṭhapetvā cattāro āruppe aññaṃ nappavattati.
anya-e0101n:790_1: Tatra ṭhapetvā vāyokasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā,
anya-e0101n:790_2: dasa asubhāti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭhena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:790_3: Pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n:790_5: sesaṃ sutenāti evaṃ tassā ārammaṇaṃ diṭṭhasutena gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:790_10: cattāro āruppāti imāni cettha na ādikammikena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:791_0: Paccayatoti imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā ākāsakasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā āruppānaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n:793_0: Evamettha cariyānukūlato vinicchayo veditabboti sabbañcetaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena ca atisappāyavasena ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:793_1: Rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārā kusalabhāvanā nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:795_1: bhāvanaṃ bhāvehī”tiādinā nayena ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni.
anya-e0101n:795_2: Tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha kammaṭṭhānakathā vinicchayo.
anya-e0101n:796_2: “Tena yoginā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā”ti ettha vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ
anya-e0101n:796_3: upasaṅkamitvā buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā
anya-e0101n:797_0: Tatra “imāhaṃ bhagavā attabhāvaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajāmī”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato attā niyyātetabbo.
anya-e0101n:797_1: Evañhi aniyyātetvā pantesu senāsanesu viharanto bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgate santhambhituṃ asakkonto gāmantaṃ
anya-e0101n:797_2: osaritvā gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho hutvā anesanaṃ āpajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0101n:797_3: Niyyātitattabhāvassa panassa bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgatepi bhayaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:797_5: purimameva attā buddhānaṃ niyyātito”ti paccavekkhato panassa somanassameva uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:797_6: Yathā hi purisassa uttamaṃ kāsikavatthaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n:797_7: tassa tasmiṃ mūsikāya vā kīṭehi vā khādite uppajjeyya domanassaṃ.
anya-e0101n:797_8: Sace pana taṃ acīvarakassa bhikkhuno dadeyya,
anya-e0101n:797_9: athassa taṃ tena bhikkhunā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ kariyamānaṃ disvāpi somanassameva uppajjeyya.
anya-e0101n:798_2: Evaṃ aniyyātitattabhāvo hi atajjanīyo vā hoti,
anya-e0101n:798_6: tamenaṃ ācariyo āmisena vā dhammena vā na saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:798_8: So imaṃ duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ alabhanto sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n:798_9: nacirasseva dussīlyaṃ vā gihibhāvaṃ vā pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:798_13: So ācariyato duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ labhanto sāsane vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa antevāsikā viya.
anya-e0101n:799_0: Therassa kira santikaṃ tayo bhikkhū āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:799_2: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte sataporise papāte patituṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n:799_4: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte imaṃ attabhāvaṃ paṇhito paṭṭhāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe ghaṃsento niravasesaṃ khepetuṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n:799_6: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte assāsapassāse uparundhitvā kālakiriyaṃ kātuṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n:799_8: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā tayopi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti ayamānisaṃso attaniyyātane.
anya-e0101n:799_9: Tena vuttaṃ “buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā”ti.
anya-e0101n:800_1: Sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā ca hutvāti ettha pana tena yoginā alobhādīnaṃ vasena chahākārehi sampannajjhāsayena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:800_2: Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayo hi tissannaṃ bodhīnaṃ aññataraṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n:800_11: sabbe te imeheva chahākārehi attanā attanā pattabbaṃ visesaṃ pattā.
anya-e0101n:800_15: nibbānādhimuttena nibbānagarukena nibbānapabbhārena ca bhavitabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n:801_1: Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayādhimuttino panassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācato cetopariyañāṇalābhinā ācariyena cittācāraṃ oloketvā cariyā jānitabbā.
anya-e0101n:801_3: Ke vā te dhammā bahulaṃ samudācaranti?
anya-e0101n:801_4: Kiṃ vā te manasikaroto phāsu hoti?
anya-e0101n:801_5: Katarasmiṃ vā te kammaṭṭhāne cittaṃ namatīti evamādīhi nayehi pucchitvā jānitabbā.
anya-e0101n:802_1: Pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa ekaṃ dve nisajjāni sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:802_3: Uggahetvā aññatra gantukāmassa nātisaṃkhittaṃ nātivitthārikaṃ katvā kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:803_0: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ tāva kathentena cattāro kasiṇadosā,
anya-e0101n:804_0: Evaṃ kathiyamāne pana kammaṭṭhāne tena yoginā nimittaṃ gahetvā sotabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:804_5: idamopammanti evaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ upanibandhitvāti attho.
anya-e0101n:804_6: Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sakkaccaṃ suṇantena hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:804_8: na itarassāti ayaṃ gahetvāti imassa padassa atthaparidīpanā.
anya-e0101n:805_0: Ettāvatā kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:805_1: gahetvāti imāni padāni sabbākārena vitthāritāni hontīti.
anya-e0101n:811_1: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti ettha yassa
anya-e0101n:811_2: tāvācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasato phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n:811_5: yo añño gāvute vā aḍḍhayojane vā yojanamattepi vā sappāyo vihāro hoti,
anya-e0101n:811_7: Evañhi sati kammaṭṭhānassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne sandehe vā satisammose vā jāte kālasseva vihāre vattaṃ
anya-e0101n:811_8: katvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccapariyosāneyeva ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃdivasamācariyassa
anya-e0101n:811_9: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā dutiyadivase ācariyaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā
anya-e0101n:811_11: Yo pana yojanappamāṇepi phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n:811_12: tena kammaṭṭhāne sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā suvisuddhaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā dūrampi
anya-e0101n:811_13: gantvā samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:813_1: Tattha ananurūpo nāma aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato.
anya-e0101n:813_14: kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena dosena samannāgato ananurūpo nāma.
anya-e0101n:814_2: te aññamaññaṃ paṭiviruddhatāya vattaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0101n:814_5: Tatrāyaṃ gocaragāme piṇḍāya carissāmīti pattacīvaramādāya nikkhanto sace passati vattaṃ vā akataṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā rittaṃ,
anya-e0101n:814_10: atidivā paviṭṭho niṭṭhitāya bhikkhāya kiñci na labhati.
anya-e0101n:814_11: Paṭisallānagatopi sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ uccāsaddena saṅghakammehi ca vikkhipati.
anya-e0101n:814_12: Yattha pana sabbaṃ vattaṃ katameva hoti,
anya-e0101n:815_2: Yattha pana bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu,
anya-e0101n:817_1: Vikāle āgatānaṃ attano senāsanaṃ datvā rukkhamūle vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vā vasitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:817_2: Punadivasepi evamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa okāso na hoti.
anya-e0101n:817_3: Yattha pana evarūpo āgantukasambādho na hoti,
anya-e0101n:818_3: tesaṃ bhājanadārudoṇikādīni pucchantānaṃ asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāneti dassetabbāni honti,
anya-e0101n:819_1: tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassāpi santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo
anya-e0101n:820_0: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
anya-e0101n:821_4: sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti.
anya-e0101n:822_1: ayamarahāti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti,
anya-e0101n:822_4: tena divā aññatra gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:824_0: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi,
anya-e0101n:824_1: tattha kaṭṭhahārikā pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsuṃ karonti,
anya-e0101n:824_3: te chinditvā gharāni karissāmāti manussā āgantvā chindanti.
anya-e0101n:824_4: Sace sāyanhasamayaṃ padhānagharā nikkhamitvā vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati,
anya-e0101n:825_0: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito,
anya-e0101n:825_1: tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti,
anya-e0101n:825_7: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
anya-e0101n:825_8: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:826_0: Visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitāti yattha aññamaññaṃ visabhāgaverī bhikkhū viharanti,
anya-e0101n:826_2: evaṃ karothāti vāriyamānā etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmhāti vattāro bhavanti.
anya-e0101n:827_0: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā nissito hoti,
anya-e0101n:827_1: tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā okāsaṃ detha,
anya-e0101n:828_0: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
anya-e0101n:829_1: Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti paharati,
anya-e0101n:829_3: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño vijite vicarati,
anya-e0101n:829_5: Atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
anya-e0101n:830_0: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
anya-e0101n:830_3: Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā gāyi.
anya-e0101n:830_9: Atha naṃ sā vegenāgantvā gahetvā “mayā, bhante,
anya-e0101n:830_10: na eko na dve tumhādisā khāditā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:831_0: Kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā upajjhāyasamaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ.
anya-e0101n:831_1: Tattha so kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābho mahādosoyevāti imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato ananurūpoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:833_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
anya-e0101n:839_1: Yo pana gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato,
anya-e0101n:839_11: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasireneva uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
anya-e0101n:839_12: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
anya-e0101n:839_13: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:839_17: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0101n:840_0: Ayaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:842_1: Khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvāti evaṃ patirūpe vihāre viharantena yepissa te honti khuddakapalibodhā,
anya-e0101n:842_5: Jiṇṇacīvaresu daḷhīkammaṃ vā tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:844_1: Idāni sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ettha ayaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakammaṭṭhānavasena vitthārakathā hoti.
anya-e0101n:845_0: Evaṃ upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena hi bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā
anya-e0101n:845_1: pavivitte okāse sukhanisinnena katāya vā akatāya vā pathaviyā nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:846_0: “Pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pathaviyaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti kate vā akate vā sāntake,
anya-e0101n:846_11: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ānisaṃsadassāvī
anya-e0101n:846_12: ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati ‘addhā imāya
anya-e0101n:847_0: Tattha yena atītabhavepi sāsane vā isipabbajjāya vā pabbajitvā pathavīkasiṇe catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattitapubbāni,
anya-e0101n:847_1: evarūpassa puññavato upanissayasampannassa akatāya pathaviyā kasitaṭṭhāne vā khalamaṇḍale vā nimittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:847_3: Tassa kirāyasmato kasitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentassa taṃṭhānappamāṇameva nimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n:847_4: So taṃ vaḍḍhetvā pañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n:848_1: tena ācariyasantike uggahitakammaṭṭhānavidhānaṃ avirādhetvā cattāro kasiṇadose pariharantena kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_3: Tasmā nīlādivaṇṇaṃ mattikaṃ aggahetvā gaṅgāvahe mattikāsadisāya aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_4: Tañca kho vihāramajjhe sāmaṇerādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne na kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_5: Vihārapaccante pana paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pabbhāre vā paṇṇasālāya vā saṃhārimaṃ vā tatraṭṭhakaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_6: Tatra saṃhārimaṃ catūsu daṇḍakesu pilotikaṃ vā cammaṃ vā kaṭasārakaṃ vā bandhitvā tattha apanītatiṇamūlasakkharakathalikāya
anya-e0101n:848_7: sumadditāya mattikāya vuttappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭaṃ limpetvā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_9: Tatraṭṭhakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ padumakaṇṇikākārena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā vallīhi vinandhitvā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_11: adho aññaṃ pakkhipitvā uparibhāge suparisodhitāya aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:848_12: Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:849_1: Tasmā evaṃ vuttappamāṇaparicchedaṃ katvā rukkhapāṇikā visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti.
anya-e0101n:849_2: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā pāsāṇapāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā samaṃ bherītalasadisaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā nhatvā
anya-e0101n:849_3: āgantvā kasiṇamaṇḍalato aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese paññatte vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake suatthate pīṭhe
anya-e0101n:849_5: Tato dūratare nisinnassa hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:849_7: Uccatare nisinnena gīvaṃ onamitvā oloketabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:849_9: Tasmā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā “appassādā kāmā”tiādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāmanissaraṇe
anya-e0101n:849_11: janayitvā “ayaṃ dāni sā sabbabuddha paccekabuddha ariyasāvakehi paṭipannā nekkhammapaṭipadā”ti paṭipattiyā
anya-e0101n:849_12: sañjātagāravena “addhā imāya paṭipadāya pavivekasukharasassa bhāgī bhavissāmī”ti ussāhaṃ janayitvā samena
anya-e0101n:849_13: ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:850_6: Tasmā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viya samenākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:850_9: Apica vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:850_18: tāva kālasatampi kālasahassampi tato bhiyyopi eteneva nayena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:851_1: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato yadā nimīletvā āvajjantassa ummīlitakāle viya āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:851_3: Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:851_4: Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā tattha nisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:851_5: Pādadhovanapapañcaparihāratthaṃ panassa ekapaṭalikupāhanā ca kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo.
anya-e0101n:851_6: Athānena sace taruṇo samādhi kenacideva asappāyakāraṇena nassati,
anya-e0101n:851_7: upāhanā āruyha kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nimittaṃ ādāya āgantvā sukhanisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:852_0: Tatrāyaṃ purimassa ca uggahanimittassa imassa ca viseso,
anya-e0101n:852_2: paṭibhāganimittaṃ thavikato nihatādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya sudhotasaṅkhathālaṃ viya valāhakantarā nikkhantacandamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0101n:852_3: viya meghamukhe balākā viya uggahanimittaṃ padāletvā nikkhantamiva tato sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suparisuddhaṃ
anya-e0101n:853_1: Uppannakālato ca panassa paṭṭhāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0101n:854_0: Duvidho hi samādhi upacārasamādhi ca appanāsamādhi ca.
anya-e0101n:854_1: Dvīhākārehi cittaṃ samādhiyati upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n:854_2: Tattha upacārabhūmiyaṃ nīvaraṇappahānena cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:855_3: yathā nāma daharo kumārako ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati,
anya-e0101n:855_4: evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ kālena nimittamārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:855_8: yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0101n:855_9: evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:856_0: Tatra yadetaṃ upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0101n:856_2: Tasmā sace teneva pallaṅkena taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkoti, sundaraṃ.
anya-e0101n:856_4: athānena taṃ nimittaṃ appamattena cakkavattigabbho viya rakkhitabbaṃ. Evañhi –
anya-e0101n:861_0: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
anya-e0101n:865_0: Tatrassa yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati,
anya-e0101n:865_5: Yattha nimittaṃ uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti,
anya-e0101n:865_9: Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti,
anya-e0101n:865_10: tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:865_12: Āvāsasappāyatāya hi tambapaṇṇidīpamhi cūḷanāgaleṇe vasantā tattheva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e0101n:865_13: Sotāpannādīnaṃ pana aññattha ariyabhūmiṃ patvā tattha arahattappattānañca gaṇanā natthi.
anya-e0101n:866_0: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho,
anya-e0101n:868_1: yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n:868_5: So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti,
anya-e0101n:869_4: Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n:869_7: taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu sappāyo.
anya-e0101n:869_8: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ itaro ca utu asappāyo.
anya-e0101n:870_2: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n:871_0: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:871_1: Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi nimittāsevanabahulassa nacireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
anya-e0101n:873_1: Yassa pana evampi paṭipajjato na hoti,
anya-e0101n:873_8: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:873_9: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:873_10: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti,
anya-e0101n:873_11: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0101n:874_1: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:874_5: Yadā panassa cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:874_8: Ajjhattikabāhire ca vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:874_9: aparisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
anya-e0101n:874_10: Aparisuddhena ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti,
anya-e0101n:874_11: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0101n:874_12: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:874_13: parisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
anya-e0101n:874_14: Parisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi vibhūtā honti,
anya-e0101n:874_15: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:875_2: Sace hissa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti itarāni mandāni,
anya-e0101n:875_7: tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0101n:875_11: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:875_15: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:875_16: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
anya-e0101n:875_22: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati.
anya-e0101n:875_23: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati.
anya-e0101n:875_24: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati.
anya-e0101n:875_25: Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n:875_30: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:875_36: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato kosajjapakkhena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati,
anya-e0101n:875_38: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā. Tenāha –
anya-e0101n:875_43: na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n:876_1: Nimittakosallaṃ nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ,
anya-e0101n:877_4: tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
anya-e0101n:878_3: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n:878_10: puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
anya-e0101n:878_32: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n:879_0: Ettha ca yathāsakamāhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:880_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā.
anya-e0101n:880_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:881_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n:882_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:883_0: Tattha sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena pavattamanasikāro kusalādīsu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n:883_1: Ārambhadhātuādīnaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikāro ārambhadhātuādīsu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n:883_4: Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
anya-e0101n:883_5: Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammāti pana pītiyā eva etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0101n:884_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā,
anya-e0101n:885_3: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:885_6: so ca anatikkamanīyasāsano amhākañca bahūpakāro paṭipattiyā ca pūjiyamāno pūjito hoti na itarathā”ti evaṃ satthu mahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:885_8: tañca na sakkā kusītena gahetu”nti evaṃ dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:886_0: Ekādasadhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti buddhānussati, dhamma… saṅgha… sīla… cāga…
anya-e0101n:886_7: Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
anya-e0101n:887_4: tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
anya-e0101n:888_3: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
anya-e0101n:888_7: puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
anya-e0101n:888_29: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
anya-e0101n:889_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n:890_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n:891_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n:892_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n:893_1: taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikārova tīsupi padesu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n:894_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanasevanatā,
anya-e0101n:895_0: Ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadatā,
anya-e0101n:896_0: Pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā,
anya-e0101n:896_5: Iti imehākārehi ete dhamme uppādento passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
anya-e0101n:896_6: Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n:897_3: Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:898_2: Yadāssa evaṃ paṭipajjato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:899_0: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhapubbānaṃ anekakiccapasutānaṃ vikkhittahadayānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā pariccāgo.
anya-e0101n:900_0: Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ samādhilābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:907_0: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
anya-e0101n:908_0: Hitvā hi sammāvāyāmaṃ, visesaṃ nāma māṇavo;
anya-e0101n:919_2: yathā hi acheko madhukaro asukasmiṃ rukkhe pupphaṃ pupphitanti ñatvā tikkhena vegena pakkhando taṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0101n:919_4: Aparo acheko mandena javena pakkhando khīṇeyeva sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:919_5: Cheko pana samena javena pakkhando sukhena puppharāsiṃ sampatvā yāvadicchakaṃ reṇuṃ ādāya madhuṃ sampādetvā madhurasamanubhavati.
anya-e0101n:920_0: Yathā ca sallakattaantevāsikesu udakathālagate uppalapatte satthakammaṃ sikkhantesu eko acheko vegena
anya-e0101n:920_1: satthaṃ pātento uppalapattaṃ dvidhā vā chindati,
anya-e0101n:920_3: Aparo acheko chijjanapavesanabhayā satthakena phusitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n:920_4: Cheko pana samena payogena tattha satthapahāraṃ dassetvā pariyodātasippo hutvā tathārūpesu ṭhānesu kammaṃ katvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:921_1: so cattāri sahassāni labhatīti raññā vutte eko achekapuriso vegena makkaṭasuttamākaḍḍhanto tahiṃ tahiṃ chindatiyeva.
anya-e0101n:921_2: Aparo acheko chedanabhayā hatthena phusitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n:921_3: Cheko pana koṭito paṭṭhāya samena payogena daṇḍake vedhetvā āharitvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:922_0: Yathā ca acheko niyāmako balavavāte laṅkāraṃ pūrento nāvaṃ videsaṃ pakkhandāpeti.
anya-e0101n:922_1: Aparo acheko mandavāte laṅkāraṃ oropento nāvaṃ tattheva ṭhapeti.
anya-e0101n:922_2: Cheko pana mandavāte laṅkāraṃ pūretvā balavavāte aḍḍhalaṅkāraṃ katvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:923_0: Yathā ca yo telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūreti,
anya-e0101n:923_1: so lābhaṃ labhatīti ācariyena antevāsikānaṃ vutte eko acheko lābhaluddho vegena pūrento telaṃ chaḍḍeti.
anya-e0101n:923_2: Aparo acheko telachaḍḍanabhayā āsiñcitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n:923_3: Cheko pana samena payogena pūretvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:924_0: Evameva eko bhikkhu uppanne nimitte sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:924_3: Eko accāraddhavīriyatāya dosaṃ disvā kiṃ dānime appanāyāti vīriyaṃ hāpeti,
anya-e0101n:924_6: Yo pana īsakampi līnaṃ līnabhāvato uddhataṃ uddhaccato mocetvā samena payogena nimittābhimukhaṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0101n:930_1: Iti evaṃ nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādayato panassa idāni appanā ijjhissatīti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
anya-e0101n:930_2: pathavī pathavīti anuyogavasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanamuppajjati.
anya-e0101n:930_3: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
anya-e0101n:930_7: yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannapadeso gāmūpacāro nagarūpacāroti vuccati,
anya-e0101n:930_8: evaṃ appanāya āsannattā samīpacārattā vā upacārānītipi,
anya-e0101n:930_10: upari appanāya ca anulomato anulomānītipi vuccanti.
anya-e0101n:931_0: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero pana “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n:931_1: āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā āsevanapaccayena pacchimo pacchimo dhammo balavā hoti,
anya-e0101n:931_2: tasmā chaṭṭhepi sattamepi appanā hotīti āha,
anya-e0101n:931_3: taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “attano matimattaṃ therasseta”nti vatvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:931_7: Tameva vicāretvā vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ.
anya-e0101n:931_8: Yathā hi puriso chinnapapātābhimukho dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi pariyante pādaṃ katvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti papāte eva patati,
anya-e0101n:931_9: evaṃ chaṭṭhe vā sattame vā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:932_1: Sattasu hi ṭhānesu addhānaparicchedo nāma natthi paṭhamappanāyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:932_8: Ettha maggānantaraphalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti.
anya-e0101n:932_9: Nirodhassa paccayo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnamupari na hoti.
anya-e0101n:933_0: Ettāvatā ca panesa vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0101n:933_1: Evamanena pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:934_1: Tattha vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apakkamitvā.
anya-e0101n:934_5: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa
anya-e0101n:935_1: “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0101n:935_2: nūna jhānassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0101n:936_3: kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyāti?
anya-e0101n:936_6: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n:936_10: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati,
anya-e0101n:936_12: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusaladhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
anya-e0101n:936_13: Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:936_14: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo,
anya-e0101n:936_15: kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n:936_16: tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0101n:937_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā,
anya-e0101n:937_2: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo,
anya-e0101n:937_8: ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā,
anya-e0101n:937_10: Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati,
anya-e0101n:937_12: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati,
anya-e0101n:937_14: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
anya-e0101n:937_15: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0101n:937_16: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:937_22: Esa tāva nayo kāmehīti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
anya-e0101n:938_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
anya-e0101n:938_1: So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmo chando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
anya-e0101n:938_4: Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:939_0: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā,
anya-e0101n:939_1: kāmacchando”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge upari jhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato nīvaraṇāneva vuttāni.
anya-e0101n:939_3: tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni viddhaṃsakāni vighātakānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:940_0: Evamettha vivicceva kāmehīti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
anya-e0101n:940_1: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:940_4: Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
anya-e0101n:940_11: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:940_12: Ayaṃ tāva vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti ettha atthappakāsanā.
anya-e0101n:941_1: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:941_6: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:943_0: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇḍābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko.
anya-e0101n:943_1: Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇḍānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro.
anya-e0101n:943_2: Vipphāravā cettha vitakko paṭhamuppattikāle paripphandanabhūto cittassa ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino
anya-e0101n:943_3: pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa.
anya-e0101n:943_4: Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo cittassa ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya,
anya-e0101n:943_5: paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
anya-e0101n:943_6: Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
anya-e0101n:943_7: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko.
anya-e0101n:943_8: Vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:943_10: So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n:944_0: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
anya-e0101n:944_3: Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko,
anya-e0101n:944_4: ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro.
anya-e0101n:944_5: Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko,
anya-e0101n:944_7: Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:944_8: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
anya-e0101n:946_11: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n:946_13: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ vīci viya kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0101n:946_14: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā.
anya-e0101n:946_15: Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho
anya-e0101n:946_16: hutvā “imāya vata velāya catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ vandantī”ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:946_17: ubbegāpītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n:946_18: Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi balavabuddhārammaṇāya ubbegāpītiyā ākāse laṅghesi.
anya-e0101n:947_0: Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gacchantā “amma tvaṃ garubhārā akāle vicarituṃ na sakkosi,
anya-e0101n:947_1: mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti agamaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:947_2: Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī ghare ohīyitvā gharājire ṭhatvā candālokena girikaṇḍake
anya-e0101n:947_4: catasso ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi.
anya-e0101n:947_6: ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcarituṃ,
anya-e0101n:947_7: evarūpañca madhuradhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī”ti muttarāsisadisaṃ cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi.
anya-e0101n:947_8: Sā ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n:947_9: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro āgantvā “amma tvaṃ katarena maggena āgatāsī”ti pucchiṃsu.
anya-e0101n:947_11: na maggenā”ti vatvā “amma ākāsena nāma khīṇāsavā sañcaranti,
anya-e0101n:947_13: “mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ ālokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajji.
anya-e0101n:947_16: gahitanimitteneva pana ākāse laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitāmhī”ti.
anya-e0101n:948_1: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:949_0: Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca.
anya-e0101n:949_1: Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhampi sukhaṃ paripūreti kāyikañca cetasikañca.
anya-e0101n:949_2: Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanā samādhinti.
anya-e0101n:949_3: Tāsu yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ gatā pharaṇāpīti,
anya-e0101n:950_7: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti.
anya-e0101n:950_17: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:950_18: Iti ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa,
anya-e0101n:950_19: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:951_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:951_3: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:951_8: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:952_5: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:952_7: Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyaṃ vuttiṃ
anya-e0101n:952_8: pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti.
anya-e0101n:952_9: Vuttañhetaṃ vibhaṅge “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
anya-e0101n:954_5: vicikicchāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:954_6: Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:954_8: Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n:954_10: Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayappalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati.
anya-e0101n:954_11: Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā taṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n:954_12: Byāpādena cārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na nirantaraṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n:954_16: Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttānīti.
anya-e0101n:955_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti,
anya-e0101n:955_2: tehi avikkhepāya sampāditappayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīṇanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:955_4: Atha naṃ sasesasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānuppabandhanapīṇanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyati,
anya-e0101n:955_5: tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:955_6: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n:955_8: Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:955_12: evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva pañcaṅgikanti vā pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti vā vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:956_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi,
anya-e0101n:956_3: Ettha hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:956_7: “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n:956_8: Cittekaggatāpi heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇesu phusitā hutvā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:956_10: Tattha cittekaggatā kiñcāpi savitakkaṃ savicāranti imasmiṃ pāṭhe na niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0101n:956_11: tathāpi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti evaṃ vuttattā aṅgameva.
anya-e0101n:956_12: Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato,
anya-e0101n:958_1: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tividhakalyāṇatā.
anya-e0101n:958_2: Tesaṃyeva ca ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:960_11: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
anya-e0101n:960_15: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti tilakkhaṇasampannañca.
anya-e0101n:961_11: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva hoti tilakkhaṇasampannañca.
anya-e0101n:962_9: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
anya-e0101n:963_3: Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:963_6: dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā ca veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:964_2: tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa jhānassa paribandho,
anya-e0101n:964_4: Visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n:964_6: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattamupagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma,
anya-e0101n:964_7: evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0101n:964_8: Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:965_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
anya-e0101n:965_1: Samathabhāvupagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
anya-e0101n:965_2: Samathapaṭipannabhāvato eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
anya-e0101n:966_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā,
anya-e0101n:966_1: yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni,
anya-e0101n:966_2: yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati,
anya-e0101n:966_3: yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
anya-e0101n:966_4: sabbepi te ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā sampahaṃsitattā
anya-e0101n:966_6: tasmā “dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:967_0: Tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:968_0: Idāni paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇanti ettha gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ,
anya-e0101n:968_6: Tatra imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:968_7: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇa”nti.
anya-e0101n:970_1: Evamadhigate pana etasmiṃ tena yoginā vālavedhinā viya,
anya-e0101n:970_3: Yathā hi sukusalo dhanuggaho vālavedhāya kammaṃ kurumāno yasmiṃ vāre vālaṃ vijjhati,
anya-e0101n:970_4: tasmiṃ vāre akkantapadānañca dhanudaṇḍassa ca jiyāya ca sarassa ca ākāraṃ pariggaṇheyya.
anya-e0101n:970_5: “Evaṃ me ṭhitena evaṃ dhanudaṇḍaṃ evaṃ jiyaṃ evaṃ saraṃ gahetvā vālo viddho”ti.
anya-e0101n:970_6: So tato paṭṭhāya tatheva te ākāre sampādento avirādhetvā vālaṃ vijjheyya.
anya-e0101n:970_7: Evameva yogināpi “imaṃ nāma me bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sevamānena evarūpe senāsane iminā
anya-e0101n:970_8: nāma iriyāpathena imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ adhigata”nti ete bhojanasappāyādayo ākārā pariggahetabbā.
anya-e0101n:970_9: Evañhi so naṭṭhe vā tasmiṃ te ākāre sampādetvā puna uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0101n:970_10: appaguṇaṃ vā paguṇaṃ karonto punappunaṃ appetuṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0101n:971_0: Yathā ca kusalo sūdo bhattāraṃ parivisanto tassa yaṃ yaṃ ruciyā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n:971_1: taṃ taṃ sallakkhetvā tato paṭṭhāya tādisameva upanāmento lābhassa bhāgī hoti,
anya-e0101n:971_2: evamayampi adhigatakkhaṇe bhojanādayo ākāre gahetvā te sampādento naṭṭhe naṭṭhe punappunaṃ appanāya lābhī hoti.
anya-e0101n:971_3: Tasmā tena vālavedhinā viya sūdena viya ca ākārā pariggahetabbā.
anya-e0101n:972_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattaṃ vā nānaccayehi sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa ambilaggehipi
anya-e0101n:972_3: tittakaggehipi kaṭukaggehipi madhuraggehipi khārikehipi akhārikehipi loṇikehipi aloṇikehipi.
anya-e0101n:972_6: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti ‘idaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0101n:972_10: ambilaggaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0101n:972_17: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo lābhī ceva hoti acchādanassa,
anya-e0101n:972_23: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n:972_26: idhekacco paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe…
anya-e0101n:972_29: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
anya-e0101n:972_30: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n:972_35: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu lābhī ceva hoti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:972_40: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti.
anya-e0101n:973_0: Nimittaggahaṇena cassa puna te ākāre sampādayato appanāmattameva ijjhati,
anya-e0101n:973_2: Ciraṭṭhānaṃ pana samādhiparibandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ suvisodhitattā hoti.
anya-e0101n:973_3: Yo hi bhikkhu kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandaṃ na suṭṭhu vikkhambhetvā,
anya-e0101n:973_7: aññepi samādhiparibandhe dhamme na suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n:973_8: so avisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya avisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca khippameva nikkhamati.
anya-e0101n:973_9: Yo pana samādhiparibandhe dhamme suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n:973_10: so suvisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya suparisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca sakalampi divasabhāgaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃyeva hoti.
anya-e0101n:978_0: Tasmā ciraṭṭhitikāmena paribandhakadhamme visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:978_2: Tassa dve vaḍḍhanābhūmiyo upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n:978_3: Upacāraṃ patvāpi hi taṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati appanaṃ patvāpi.
anya-e0101n:980_3: yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantare kasati,
anya-e0101n:980_4: yathā vā pana bhikkhū sīmaṃ bandhantā paṭhamaṃ nimittāni sallakkhetvā pacchā bandhanti,
anya-e0101n:980_5: evameva tassa yathāladdhassa nimittassa anukkamena ekaṅguladvaṅgulativaṅgulacaturaṅgulamattaṃ manasā paricchinditvā yathāparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:980_8: vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedena vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:981_0: Yathā hi haṃsapotakā pakkhānaṃ uṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya parittaṃ parittaṃ padesaṃ uppatantā paricayaṃ katvā anukkamena candimasūriyasantikaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n:981_1: evameva bhikkhu vuttanayena nimittaṃ paricchinditvā vaḍḍhento yāva cakkavāḷaparicchedā tato vā uttari vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0101n:981_2: Athassa taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n:982_0: Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena samāpajjanabahulena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:982_2: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0101n:982_3: Athassa tāni evaṃ upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0101n:982_4: So appaguṇe jhāne ussukkamāno pattapaṭhamajjhānā ca parihāyati,
anya-e0101n:983_2: gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate carituṃ.
anya-e0101n:983_6: Sā purimaṃ pādaṃ na supatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchimaṃ pādaṃ uddhareyya,
anya-e0101n:983_7: sā na ceva agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:983_16: gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate carituṃ,
anya-e0101n:983_19: idhekacco bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
anya-e0101n:983_36: seyyathāpi sā gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate caritu”nti.
anya-e0101n:984_0: Tasmānena tasmiṃyeva tāva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:986_6: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ āvajjeti,
anya-e0101n:987_1: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
anya-e0101n:987_2: vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
anya-e0101n:987_5: vuttanayāneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu yadā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:987_7: Ayaṃ pana matthakappattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye labbhati,
anya-e0101n:987_9: Ito paraṃ sīghatarā āvajjanavasī nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:988_0: Āyasmato pana mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandanāgarājadamane viya sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n:989_0: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n:989_1: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n:990_0: So hāyasmā upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ
anya-e0101n:990_1: tiṃsamattānaṃ iddhimantasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno therassa yāguṃ paṭiggāhayamānaṃ upaṭṭhākanāgarājānaṃ
anya-e0101n:990_2: gahessāmīti ākāsato pakkhandantaṃ supaṇṇarājānaṃ disvā tāvadeva pabbataṃ nimminitvā nāgarājānaṃ bāhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:993_1: Imāsu pana pañcasu vasīsu ciṇṇavasinā paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n:993_2: vitakkavicārānaṃ oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikatvā paṭhamajjhāne
anya-e0101n:993_4: Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vitakkavicārā oḷārikato upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n:993_6: tadāssa oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:993_7: “idāni dutiyajjhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0101n:993_9: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0101n:994_0: Ettāvatā cesa vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ
anya-e0101n:994_1: samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0101n:994_2: Evamanena dvaṅgavippahīnaṃ tivaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:995_1: Tattha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā samatikkamā,
anya-e0101n:995_3: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi.
anya-e0101n:995_6: Oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
anya-e0101n:996_3: tasmā attani jātaṃ attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0101n:996_7: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca cetaso sampasādayati,
anya-e0101n:996_9: Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:996_10: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:997_2: vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
anya-e0101n:997_4: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvā itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:997_7: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi,
anya-e0101n:997_9: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
anya-e0101n:998_2: atha kasmā idameva “sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti. Vuccate,
anya-e0101n:998_3: aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:998_5: Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo,
anya-e0101n:998_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
anya-e0101n:998_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo.
anya-e0101n:998_13: Evaṃ vuttena pana tena saddhiṃ ayamatthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati,
anya-e0101n:999_4: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā
anya-e0101n:1000_0: Etthāha “nanu ca ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti imināpi ayamattho siddho,
anya-e0101n:1000_1: atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ ‘avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti”. Vuccate,
anya-e0101n:1000_4: Nanu avocumha “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1000_5: samadhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0101n:1001_4: paṭhamajjhānamiva ca na aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1001_5: Tathā vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ,
anya-e0101n:1001_6: na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
anya-e0101n:1002_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
anya-e0101n:1002_2: atha kho ayameva samādhi “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā,
anya-e0101n:1003_4: Yathā ca paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n:1003_6: Appanākkhaṇeyeva ca panetaṃ vinā tehi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1003_8: Pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ uppattivasena tivaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1003_9: Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti sampasādo pīti sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1003_10: taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1003_11: Ṭhapetvā pana sampasādanaṃ nippariyāyena upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tivaṅgikameva etaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:1005_1: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n:1005_4: etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti vuttāya pītiyā oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyajjhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1005_5: santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya tatiyādhigamāya yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n:1005_6: Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato pīti oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1005_8: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:1005_9: “idāni tatiyajjhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1005_11: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0101n:1005_14: Ettāvatā ca panesa pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno,
anya-e0101n:1005_16: yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti,
anya-e0101n:1005_18: Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1006_1: Tattha pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
anya-e0101n:1006_3: so vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n:1006_5: tadā “pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā cā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1006_6: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti,
anya-e0101n:1006_7: tasmā “pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:1006_10: kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1006_11: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti,
anya-e0101n:1006_12: tasmā “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:1007_1: imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1007_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0101n:1007_4: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
anya-e0101n:1007_7: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1007_8: Tenāyamattho vutto “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1008_1: Upekkhako ca viharatīti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā.
anya-e0101n:1008_4: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī upekkhakoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1010_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
anya-e0101n:1010_4: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
anya-e0101n:1011_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1012_0: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1013_0: Yā pana “kālenakālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikarotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1014_3: Dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1015_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaññitā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1016_2: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1017_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1018_0: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1019_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1020_0: Tatra chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā,
anya-e0101n:1020_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0101n:1020_3: Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya.
anya-e0101n:1021_2: Paññā eva hi sā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā.
anya-e0101n:1021_3: Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu kho,
anya-e0101n:1021_6: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:1021_8: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ tāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca
anya-e0101n:1021_9: iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1021_10: Evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā,
anya-e0101n:1021_12: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
anya-e0101n:1021_13: Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti.
anya-e0101n:1021_14: Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnā evāti.
anya-e0101n:1022_7: Tasmā tatrāpi upekkhako ca viharatīti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā,
anya-e0101n:1022_10: Aparibyattañhi tassā tattha kiccaṃ vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā.
anya-e0101n:1022_11: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
anya-e0101n:1025_1: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato.
anya-e0101n:1026_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi.
anya-e0101n:1026_1: Muṭṭhasatissa hi asampajānassa upacāramattampi na sampajjati,
anya-e0101n:1026_3: Oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1026_5: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
anya-e0101n:1026_6: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1026_8: yathā dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati,
anya-e0101n:1026_10: taṃ satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:1026_16: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1027_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi.
anya-e0101n:1027_1: Evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1027_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
anya-e0101n:1027_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya.
anya-e0101n:1027_5: Tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti āha.
anya-e0101n:1028_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgipuggalaṃ
anya-e0101n:1028_2: buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti,
anya-e0101n:1028_5: Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1029_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
anya-e0101n:1029_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
anya-e0101n:1029_6: Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti,
anya-e0101n:1029_8: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1030_4: Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n:1030_6: Sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1030_7: Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1030_8: taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1030_9: Ṭhapetvā pana upekkhāsatisampajaññāni nippariyāyena upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:1032_1: Evamadhigate pana tasmiṃpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇatatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n:1032_3: etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā
anya-e0101n:1032_4: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikatvā tatiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya catutthādhigamāya yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n:1032_5: Athassa yadā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato cetasikasomanassasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1032_6: upekkhāvedanā ceva cittekaggatā ca santato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1032_7: tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:1032_8: “idāni catutthaṃ jhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0101n:1032_10: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0101n:1032_14: yasmā sukhavedanā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
anya-e0101n:1032_18: Ettāvatā cesa sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1032_20: Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1033_1: Tattha sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
anya-e0101n:1033_4: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā,
anya-e0101n:1034_4: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānampi indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1035_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n:1035_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
anya-e0101n:1035_6: Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
anya-e0101n:1035_10: ettha cuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
anya-e0101n:1036_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n:1036_2: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1036_4: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti,
anya-e0101n:1036_5: sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1036_7: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1036_11: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n:1036_14: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n:1036_16: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
anya-e0101n:1036_17: Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n:1036_19: Tasmā eva ca etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
anya-e0101n:1037_0: Etthāha “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
anya-e0101n:1037_2: Yā hi ayaṃ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1037_3: sā sukhumā duviññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ,
anya-e0101n:1037_4: tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati,
anya-e0101n:1037_5: athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so gaṇhatha na”nti tampi gāhayati,
anya-e0101n:1037_6: evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari.
anya-e0101n:1037_7: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1037_8: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
anya-e0101n:1038_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1039_0: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1039_1: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1040_0: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānamatidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1040_5: Sukhādighātena cassa sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
anya-e0101n:1042_7: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā.
anya-e0101n:1042_9: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti,
anya-e0101n:1043_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati.
anya-e0101n:1043_1: Yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
anya-e0101n:1043_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā,
anya-e0101n:1043_3: evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā
anya-e0101n:1043_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti.
anya-e0101n:1043_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1043_9: Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā.
anya-e0101n:1044_4: Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n:1044_6: Upekkhāvedanā cittassekaggatāti imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1046_1: Pañcakajjhānaṃ pana nibbattentena paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n:1046_2: vitakkassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā paṭhamajjhāne
anya-e0101n:1046_4: Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vitakkamattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1046_6: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva dutiyajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1047_0: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannavitakkapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n:1047_1: vicārassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne
anya-e0101n:1047_3: Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vicāramattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1047_5: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1047_6: Tassa vicāramattameva pahānaṅgaṃ catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viya pītiādīni tīṇi samannāgataṅgāni.
anya-e0101n:1048_1: taṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti.
anya-e0101n:1055_3: evaṃ āpokasiṇampi bhāvetukāmena sukhanisinnena āpasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1055_4: kate vā akate vāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1055_7: Ito parañhi ettakampi avatvā visesamattameva vakkhāma.
anya-e0101n:1056_0: Idhāpi pubbekatādhikārassa puññavato akate āpasmiṃ pokkharaṇiyā vā taḷāke vā loṇiyaṃ vā samudde vā nimittaṃ uppajjati cūḷasivattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n:1056_1: Tassa kirāyasmato lābhasakkāraṃ pahāya vivittavāsaṃ vasissāmīti mahātitthe nāvamārūhitvā jambudīpaṃ gacchato
anya-e0101n:1056_2: antarā mahāsamuddaṃ olokayato tappaṭibhāgaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n:1057_0: Akatādhikārena cattāro kasiṇadose pariharantena nīlapītalohitodātavaṇṇānamaññataravaṇṇaṃ āpaṃ agahetvā
anya-e0101n:1057_1: yaṃ pana bhūmiṃ asampattameva ākāse suddhavatthena gahitaṃ udakaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1057_3: tena pattaṃ vā kuṇḍikaṃ vā samatittikaṃ pūretvā vihārapaccante vuttappakāre paṭicchanne okāse ṭhapetvā sukhanisinnena na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo.
anya-e0101n:1057_5: Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā ambu, udakaṃ, vāri,
anya-e0101n:1058_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1058_1: Idha pana uggahanimittaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1058_5: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana nipparipphandaṃ ākāse ṭhapitamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ viya maṇimayādāsamaṇḍalamiva ca hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1060_2: Tattha katādhikārassa puññavato akate nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa dīpasikhāya vā uddhane vā pattapacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1060_3: vā davadāhe vā yattha katthaci aggijālaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n:1060_4: Tassa hāyasmato dhammassavanadivase uposathāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa dīpasikhaṃ olokentasseva nimittaṃ uppajji.
anya-e0101n:1061_2: siniddhāni sāradārūni phāletvā sukkhāpetvā ghaṭikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ katvā patirūpaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ
anya-e0101n:1061_3: vā gantvā pattapacanākārena rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā kaṭasārake vā camme vā paṭe vā vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1061_5: Taṃ purato ṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā heṭṭhā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ vā upari dhūmasikhaṃ vā amanasikaritvā vemajjhe ghanajālāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1061_6: nīlanti vā pītanti vātiādivasena vaṇṇo na paccavekkhitabbo,
anya-e0101n:1061_8: Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā pāvako,
anya-e0101n:1062_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1062_1: Tattha uggahanimittaṃ jālaṃ chijjitvā chijjitvā patanasadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1062_3: alātakhaṇḍaṃ vā aṅgārapiṇḍo vā chārikā vā dhūmo vā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1062_4: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ niccalaṃ ākāse ṭhapitarattakambalakkhaṇḍaṃ viya suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭaṃ viya kañcanatthambho viya ca upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1064_2: Tañca kho diṭṭhavasena vā phuṭṭhavasena vā.
anya-e0101n:1064_3: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “vāyokasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto vāyusmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:1064_6: rukkhaggaṃ vā kesaggaṃ vā eritaṃ sameritaṃ upalakkheti,
anya-e0101n:1064_8: Tasmā samasīsaṭṭhitaṃ ghanapattaṃ ucchuṃ vā veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ ghanakesassa purisassa
anya-e0101n:1064_9: sīsaṃ vā vātena pahariyamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vāto etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatī”ti satiṃ ṭhapetvā,
anya-e0101n:1064_10: yaṃ vā panassa vātapānantarikāya vā bhittichiddena vā pavisitvā vāto kāyappadesaṃ paharati,
anya-e0101n:1064_11: tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvā vātamālutaanilādīsu vāyunāmesu pākaṭanāmavaseneva “vāto vāto”ti bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1064_12: Idha uggahanimittavaḍḍhanato otāritamattassa pāyāsassa usumavaṭṭisadisaṃ calaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1066_1: Tadanantaraṃ pana nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā
anya-e0101n:1066_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa puññavato tāva tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā pūjāṭhānesu pupphasantharaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:1066_3: nīlavatthamaṇīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1066_4: Itarena nīluppalagirikaṇṇikādīni pupphāni gahetvā yathā kesaraṃ vā vaṇṭaṃ vā na paññāyati,
anya-e0101n:1066_5: evaṃ caṅgoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pattehiyeva samatittikaṃ pūretvā santharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1066_6: Nīlavaṇṇena vā vatthena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā pūretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1066_8: Kaṃsanīlapalāsanīlaañjananīlānaṃ vā aññatarena dhātunā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena saṃhārimaṃ vā bhittiyaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:1066_10: Tato pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena “nīlaṃ nīla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1066_13: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalato muñcitvā ākāse maṇitālavaṇṭasadisaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1068_2: Vuttañhetaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pītakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti.
anya-e0101n:1068_3: Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa puññavato tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā pītavatthadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1068_4: vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n:1068_5: Tassa kirāyasmato cittalapabbate pattaṅgapupphehi kataṃ āsanapūjaṃ passato saha dassaneneva āsanappamāṇaṃ nimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n:1068_6: Itarena kaṇikārapupphādinā vā pītavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “pītakaṃ pītaka”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1070_2: Vuttañhetaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto lohitakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti.
anya-e0101n:1070_3: Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa puññavato tathārūpaṃ bandhujīvakādimālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā lohitakavatthamaṇidhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1070_5: Itarena jayasumanabandhujīvakarattakoraṇḍakādipupphehi vā rattavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0101n:1072_1: Odātakasiṇepi odātakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto odātasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā
anya-e0101n:1072_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā vassikasumanādipupphasantharaṃ
anya-e0101n:1072_3: vā kumudapadumarāsiṃ vā odātavatthadhātūnaṃ vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:1072_5: Itarena vuttappakārehi odātapupphehi vā odātavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “odātaṃ odāta”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1074_1: Ālokakasiṇe pana ālokakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ālokasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde vā tāḷacchidde vā vātapānantarikāya
anya-e0101n:1074_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato yaṃ bhittichiddādīnaṃ aññatarena sūriyāloko vā candāloko
anya-e0101n:1074_3: vā pavisitvā bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0101n:1074_4: ghanapaṇṇarukkhasākhantarena vā ghanasākhāmaṇḍapantarena vā nikkhamitvā bhūmiyameva maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0101n:1074_6: Itarenāpi tadeva vuttappakāramobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ “obhāso obhāso”ti vā “āloko āloko”ti vā bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1074_7: Tathā asakkontena ghaṭe dīpaṃ jāletvā ghaṭamukhaṃ pidahitvā ghaṭe chiddaṃ katvā bhittimukhaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1074_8: Tena chiddena dīpāloko nikkhamitvā bhittiyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:1074_11: Idha uggahanimittaṃ bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitamaṇḍalasadisameva hoti.
anya-e0101n:1076_1: Paricchinnākāsakasiṇepi ākāsakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ākāsasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde vā tāḷacchidde
anya-e0101n:1076_2: vā vātapānantarikāya vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato bhittichiddādīsu aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1076_4: Itarena succhannamaṇḍape vā cammakaṭasārakādīnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ
anya-e0101n:1076_5: katvā tadeva vā bhittichiddādibhedaṃ chiddaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1076_6: Idha uggahanimittaṃ saddhiṃ bhittipariyantādīhi chiddasadisameva hoti,
anya-e0101n:1085_1: Imesu hi pathavīkasiṇavasena ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādibhāvo,
anya-e0101n:1085_2: ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ,
