anya-e0101n:1093_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1095_0: Sabbāneva uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇanti imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0101n:1096_6: Tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti.
anya-e0101n:1096_9: Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1096_10: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti, na aññaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1096_16: Na ayamassa ādi idaṃ majjhanti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0101n:1097_1: Ye ca te sattā kammāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā
anya-e0101n:1097_2: asaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1097_5: Kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatāti niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā ceva ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakā ca.
anya-e0101n:1097_10: Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu niyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattasaṅkhātañca ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbāti attho.
anya-e0101n:1097_12: aññesupi kammaṭṭhānesu etesamekassapi bhāvanā na ijjhati.
anya-e0101n:1097_13: Tasmā vigatavipākāvaraṇenapi kulaputtena kammāvaraṇañca kilesāvaraṇañca ārakā parivajjetvā saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayādīhi
anya-e0101n:1097_14: saddhañca chandañca paññañca vaḍḍhetvā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge yogo karaṇīyoti.
anya-e0101n:1104_10: aṭṭhikanti dasasu aviññāṇakāsubhesu bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1105_3: Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1108_0: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāditanti vikkhāyitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1109_3: Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ aññena sīsanti evaṃ tato tato khittassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1110_1: Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1111_0: Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1112_0: Puḷavā vuccanti kimayo, puḷave kiratīti puḷavakaṃ. Kimiparipuṇṇassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1113_3: Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi nimittesu paṭiladdhajjhānānampetāneva nāmāni.
anya-e0101n:1115_1: Tattha uddhumātakasarīre uddhumātakanimittaṃ uppādetvā uddhumātakasaṅkhātaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena yoginā
anya-e0101n:1115_2: pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1115_7: Tenāpi sabbaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā pubbe vuttappakāraṃ senāsanaṃ upagantvā uddhumātakanimittaṃ pariyesantena vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1116_1: Evaṃ viharantena ca asukasmiṃ nāma gāmadvāre vā aṭavimukhe vā panthe vā pabbatapāde vā rukkhamūle vā
anya-e0101n:1116_2: susāne vā uddhumātakasarīraṃ nikkhittanti kathentānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāpi na tāvadeva atitthena pakkhandantena
anya-e0101n:1116_4: Asubhaṃ hi nāmetaṃ vāḷamigādhiṭṭhitampi amanussādhiṭṭhitampi hoti.
anya-e0101n:1116_6: Gamanamaggo vā panettha gāmadvārena vā nahānatitthena vā kedārakoṭiyā vā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1116_9: Purisassa hi itthisarīraṃ itthiyā ca purisasarīraṃ visabhāgaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1116_12: Sace pana “nayidaṃ mādisassa bhāriya”nti attānaṃ takkayati,
anya-e0101n:1117_1: Gacchantena ca saṅghattherassa vā aññatarassa vā abhiññātassa bhikkhuno kathetvā gantabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:1117_2: Sace hissa susāne amanussasīhabyagghādīnaṃ rūpasaddādianiṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassa aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā pavedhenti,
anya-e0101n:1117_5: Athassa so vihāre pattacīvaraṃ surakkhitaṃ karissati.
anya-e0101n:1117_6: Dahare vā sāmaṇere vā pahiṇitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭijaggissati.
anya-e0101n:1117_7: Apica susānaṃ nāma nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānanti maññamānā katakammāpi akatakammāpi corā samosaranti.
anya-e0101n:1117_8: Te manussehi anubaddhā bhikkhussa samīpe bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvāpi palāyanti.
anya-e0101n:1117_9: Manussā “sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ addasāmā”ti bhikkhuṃ gahetvā viheṭhenti.
anya-e0101n:1117_11: mamāyaṃ kathetvā iminā nāma kammena gato”ti te manusse saññāpetvā sotthibhāvaṃ karissati.
anya-e0101n:1117_13: Tasmā vuttappakārassa bhikkhuno kathetvā asubhanimittadassane sañjātābhilāsena yathānāma khattiyo abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1117_15: adhano vā pana nidhiṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajāto gacchati,
anya-e0101n:1117_16: evaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttena vidhinā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1118_0: “Uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya antogatehi
anya-e0101n:1118_2: Yasmiṃ padese uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1118_3: tasmiṃ padese pāsāṇaṃ vā vammikaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:1118_5: Sanimittaṃ katvā sārammaṇaṃ katvā uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ sabhāvabhāvato upalakkheti,
anya-e0101n:1118_6: vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopi sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato samantato.
anya-e0101n:1118_10: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā eko adutiyo gacchati
anya-e0101n:1118_11: upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena mānasena gatāgatamaggaṃ paccavekkhamāno.
anya-e0101n:1120_0: “So ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati
anya-e0101n:1120_4: Tassādhigataṃ hoti rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro bhāvanāmayañca puññakiriyavatthu”nti.
anya-e0101n:1121_2: so ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā gaṇaṃ sannipātetvāpi gacchatu.
anya-e0101n:1121_3: Kammaṭṭhānasīsena pana gacchantena ekakena adutiyena mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvā taṃ manasikaronteneva
anya-e0101n:1121_4: susāne soṇādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā yaṭṭhiṃ vā gahetvā,
anya-e0101n:1121_6: manacchaṭṭhānañca indriyānaṃ antogatabhāvasampādanato abahigatamanena hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1122_0: Vihārato nikkhamanteneva asukadisāya asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1122_14: Paṭivātaṃ gacchantassa hi kuṇapagandho ghānaṃ paharitvā matthaluṅgaṃ vā saṅkhobheyya,
anya-e0101n:1122_16: vippaṭisāraṃ vā janeyya “īdisaṃ nāma kuṇapaṭṭhānaṃ āgatomhī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1122_18: Sace anuvātamaggena na sakkā hoti gantuṃ,
anya-e0101n:1122_19: antarā pabbato vā papāto vā pāsāṇo vā vati vā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ vā udakaṃ vā cikkhallaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1123_1: Evaṃ gatena pana na tāva asubhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1123_3: Ekasmiṃ hi disābhāge ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca na vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati,
anya-e0101n:1123_5: Tasmā taṃ vajjetvā yattha ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati,
anya-e0101n:1123_9: Paṭivāte ṭhitassa hi kuṇapagandhena ubbāḷhassa cittaṃ vidhāvati.
anya-e0101n:1123_10: Anuvāte ṭhitassa sace tattha adhivatthā amanussā honti,
anya-e0101n:1123_13: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānenāpi nātidūre nāccāsanne nānupādaṃ nānusīsaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1123_14: Atidūre ṭhitassa hi ārammaṇaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1123_16: Anupādaṃ vā anusīsaṃ vā ṭhitassa sabbaṃ asubhaṃ samaṃ na paññāyati.
anya-e0101n:1123_17: Tasmā nātidūre nāccāsanne olokentassa phāsukaṭṭhāne sarīravemajjhabhāge ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1124_2: lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karotī”ti evaṃ vuttāni samantā nimittāni upalakkhetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:1124_4: sace tassa nimittassa samantā cakkhupathe pāsāṇo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1124_5: so “ayaṃ pāsāṇo ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_6: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ pāsāṇo idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1124_9: sopi “ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_10: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ vammiko idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1124_12: sopi “assattho vā nigrodho vā kacchako vā kapītano vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_13: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ rukkho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1124_15: sopi “sindivā karamando vā kaṇavīro vā kuraṇḍako vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_16: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ gaccho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1124_18: sāpi “lābu vā kumbhaṇḍī vā sāmā vā kāḷavalli vā pūtilatā vā”ti vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1124_19: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ latā idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1125_1: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ sanimittaṃ karoti sārammaṇaṃ karotīti,
anya-e0101n:1125_3: Punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e0101n:1125_5: idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ pāsāṇoti evaṃ dve dve samāsetvā samāsetvā vavatthapento sārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e0101n:1126_0: Evaṃ sanimittaṃ sārammaṇañca katvā pana sabhāvabhāvato vavatthapetīti vuttattā yvāssa sabhāvabhāvo anaññasādhāraṇo attaniyo uddhumātakabhāvo,
anya-e0101n:1126_2: Vaṇitaṃ uddhumātakanti evaṃ sabhāvena sarasena vavatthapetabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n:1127_1: Evaṃ vavatthapetvā vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopīti chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n:1127_2: Tena hi yoginā idaṃ sarīraṃ kāḷassa vā odātassa vā maṅguracchavino vāti vaṇṇato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_3: Liṅgato pana itthiliṅgaṃ vā purisaliṅgaṃ vāti avavatthapetvā paṭhamavaye vā majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā ṭhitassa idaṃ sarīranti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_13: Disato pana imasmiṃ sarīre dve disā nābhiyā adho heṭṭhimadisā uddhaṃ uparimadisāti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_14: Atha vā ahaṃ imissā disāya ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imissāti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_15: Okāsato pana imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthā,
anya-e0101n:1127_19: Atha vā ahaṃ imasmiṃ okāse ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imasminti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_20: Paricchedato idaṃ sarīraṃ adho pādatalena upari kesamatthakena tiriyaṃ tacena paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1127_28: Purisassa pana itthisarīraṃ itthiyā vā purisasarīraṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:1127_31: “Ugghāṭitāpi hi itthī purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1127_32: Tasmā sabhāgasarīreyeva evaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1128_1: Yo pana purimabuddhānaṃ santike āsevitakammaṭṭhāno parihatadhutaṅgo parimadditamahābhūto pariggahitasaṅkhāro
anya-e0101n:1128_2: vavatthāpitanāmarūpo ugghāṭitasattasañño katasamaṇadhammo vāsitavāsano bhāvitabhāvano sabījo ñāṇuttaro
anya-e0101n:1128_8: tena sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato samantatoti punapi pañcavidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_8: eko kaṭisandhīti evaṃ cuddasamahāsandhivasena sandhito vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_9: Vivaratoti vivaraṃ nāma hatthantaraṃ pādantaraṃ udarantaraṃ kaṇṇantaranti evaṃ vivarato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_10: Akkhīnampi nimmīlitabhāvo vā ummīlitabhāvo vā mukhassa ca pihitabhāvo vā vivaṭabhāvo vā vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1129_11: Ninnatoti yaṃ sarīre ninnaṭṭhānaṃ akkhikūpo vā antomukhaṃ vā galavāṭako vā,
anya-e0101n:1129_13: Atha vā ahaṃ ninne ṭhito sarīraṃ unnateti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_14: Thalatoti yaṃ sarīre unnataṭṭhānaṃ jaṇṇukaṃ vā uro vā nalāṭaṃ vā,
anya-e0101n:1129_16: Atha vā ahaṃ thale ṭhito sarīraṃ ninneti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_18: Sakalasarīre ñāṇaṃ cāretvā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1130_0: 113. Idāni “so taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotī”tiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayakathā –
anya-e0101n:1131_0: Tena yoginā tasmiṃ sarīre yathāvuttanimittaggāhavasena suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1131_2: Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontena sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva vavatthapetabbañca.
anya-e0101n:1131_3: Sarīrato nātidūre nāccāsanne padese ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā oloketvā nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1131_6: Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontassa uggahanimittaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1131_8: Yadā ummīletvā olokentassa nimmīletvā āvajjentassa ca ekasadisaṃ hutvā āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:1132_0: So taṃ nimittaṃ evaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā sace tattheva bhāvanāpariyosānaṃ pattuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:1132_1: athānena āgamanakāle vuttanayeneva ekakena adutiyena tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontena sūpaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1132_2: satiṃ katvā antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena mānasena attano senāsanameva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1133_11: imasmiṃ latāti evaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ vavatthapetvā āgatena caṅkamantenāpi tabbhāgiyova caṅkamo adhiṭṭhātabbo,
anya-e0101n:1133_14: Sace pana tassaṃ disāyaṃ sobbho vā papāto vā rukkho vā vati vā kalalaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1133_17: Taṃ disaṃ anapalokentenāpi okāsānurūpe ṭhāne caṅkamitabbañceva nisīditabbañca.
anya-e0101n:1134_2: Yassa hi avelāyaṃ uddhumātakanimittaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samantā nimittupalakkhaṇaṃ katvā nimittaggahaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_3: cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokentasseva taṃ matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā ṭhitaṃ viya ajjhottharamānaṃ viya anubandhamānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_5: so taṃ bībhacchaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ disvā vikkhittacitto ummattako viya hoti,
anya-e0101n:1134_7: Pāḷiyaṃ hi vibhattaaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu aññaṃ evarūpaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1134_8: Imasmiṃ hi kammaṭṭhāne jhānavibbhantako nāma hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:1134_10: Tasmā tena yoginā santhambhetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1134_11: Sace hi so “etassa samīpe ṭhito pāsāṇo vā latā vā āgaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:1134_13: Yathā pana so pāsāṇo vā latā vā nāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:1134_15: Ayaṃ pana tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhānākāro saññajo saññāsambhavo,
anya-e0101n:1134_17: mā bhāyi bhikkhū”ti tāsaṃ vinodetvā hāsaṃ uppādetvā tasmiṃ nimitte cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1135_0: Ekādasavidhena pana nimittaggāhaṃ sampādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhati.
anya-e0101n:1135_1: Tassa hi cakkhūni ummīletvā olokanapaccayā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1135_4: Appanāyaṃ ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattaṃ sacchikaroti.
anya-e0101n:1136_1: Gatāgatamaggapaccavekkhaṇā vīthisampaṭipādanatthāti ettha pana yā gatamaggassa ca āgatamaggassa ca paccavekkhaṇā vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1136_3: Sace hi imaṃ bhikkhuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgacchantaṃ antarāmagge keci ajja, bhante,
anya-e0101n:1136_7: ahaṃ kammaṭṭhānikoti tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:1136_18: Āgantukaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ disvā āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbova.
anya-e0101n:1136_21: Tassa tāni pūrentassāpi taṃ taruṇanimittaṃ nassati,
anya-e0101n:1136_22: puna gantvā nimittaṃ gaṇhissāmīti gantukāmassāpi amanussehi vā vāḷamigehi vā adhiṭṭhitattā susānampi gantuṃ na sakkā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1136_24: Uddhumātakaṃ hi ekameva vā dve vā divase ṭhatvā vinīlakādibhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:1136_25: Sabbakammaṭṭhānesu etena samaṃ dullabhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1136_26: Tasmā evaṃ naṭṭhe nimitte tena bhikkhunā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭhāne vā nisīditvā ahaṃ iminā nāma dvārena
anya-e0101n:1136_27: vihārā nikkhamitvā asukadisābhimukhaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne vāmaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e0101n:1136_31: Sohaṃ tena maggena gantvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne asubhaṃ addasaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1136_32: Tattha asukadisābhimukho ṭhatvā evañcevañca samantā nimittāni sallakkhetvā evaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggahetvā
anya-e0101n:1136_33: asukadisāya susānato nikkhamitvā evarūpena nāma maggena idañcidañca karonto āgantvā idha nisinnoti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1136_36: Tassevaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ nimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1137_1: Idāni ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1137_2: upanibandhatīti ettha uddhumātakapaṭikkūle mānasaṃ cāretvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1137_3: vaḍḍhento “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinā bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1138_0: Yathā pana duggato puriso mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ labhitvā dullabhaṃ vata me laddhanti tasmiṃ ratanasaññī
anya-e0101n:1138_1: hutvā gāravaṃ janetvā vipulena pemena sampiyāyamāno taṃ rakkheyya,
anya-e0101n:1138_2: evameva “dullabhaṃ me idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ duggatassa mahagghamaṇiratanasadisaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1138_3: Catudhātukammaṭṭhāniko hi attano cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:1138_7: ‘Idaṃ pana ekameva vā dve vā divase tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1138_8: tato paraṃ vinīlakādibhāvaṃ pāpuṇātī’ti natthi ito dullabhatara”nti tasmiṃ ratanasaññinā hutvā cittīkāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1138_10: Rattiṭṭhāne ca divāṭhāne ca “uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ uddhumātakapaṭikkūla”nti tattha punappunaṃ cittaṃ upanibandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1139_3: uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1139_4: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā nipanno thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya.
anya-e0101n:1139_5: Tassa paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva bahiddhā kāmānaṃ amanasikārā vikkhambhanavasena kāmacchando pahīyati.
anya-e0101n:1139_6: Anunayappahāneneva cassa lohitappahānena pubbo viya byāpādopi pahīyati.
anya-e0101n:1139_9: adhigatavisesassa paccakkhatāya paṭipattidesake satthari paṭipattiyaṃ paṭipattiphale ca vicikicchā pahīyatīti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti.
anya-e0101n:1139_10: Tasmiññeva ca nimitte cetaso abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko,
anya-e0101n:1139_15: sukhitassa cittasamādhisambhavato sukhanimittā ekaggatā cāti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavanti.
anya-e0101n:1139_17: Ito paraṃ yāva paṭhamajjhānassa appanā ceva vasippatti ca,
anya-e0101n:1141_1: Ito paresu pana vinīlakādīsupi yaṃ taṃ “uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n:1141_2: satiyā”tiādinā nayena gamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1141_4: vipubbakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto”ti evaṃ tassa tassa vasena tattha tattha uddhumātakapadamattaṃ parivattetvā
anya-e0101n:1144_0: Vicchiddakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍale vā corāṭaviyaṃ vā susāne vā yattha rājāno core chindāpenti.
anya-e0101n:1144_1: Araññe vā pana sīhabyagghehi chinnapurisaṭṭhāne labbhati.
anya-e0101n:1144_2: Tasmā tathārūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā sace nānādisāyaṃ patitampi ekāvajjanena āpāthamāgacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1144_6: Tasmā ārāmikena vā samaṇuddesena vā aññena vā kenaci ekaṭṭhāne kāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1144_7: Alabhantena kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā ekaṅgulantaraṃ katvā upanāmetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1144_9: Tattha uggahanimittaṃ majjhe chiddaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1145_1: Uggahanimittaṃ panettha tahiṃ tahiṃ khāyitasadisameva upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1146_0: Vikkhittakampi vicchiddake vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “vikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ
anya-e0101n:1147_1: Tasmā tattha gantvā vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūla”nti
anya-e0101n:1147_3: Uggahanimittaṃ panettha paññāyamānaṃ pahāramukhaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n:1148_0: Lohitakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍalādīsu laddhappahārānaṃ hatthapādādīsu vā chinnesu bhinnagaṇḍapīḷakādīnaṃ vā mukhato paggharamānakāle labbhati.
anya-e0101n:1148_1: Tasmā taṃ disvā “lohitakapaṭikkūlaṃ lohitakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1148_2: Ettha uggahanimittaṃ vātappahatā viya rattapaṭākā calamānākāraṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1149_0: Puḷavakaṃ dvīhatīhaccayena kuṇapassa navahi vaṇamukhehi kimirāsipaggharaṇakāle hoti.
anya-e0101n:1149_1: Apica taṃ soṇasiṅgālamanussagomahiṃsahatthiassaajagarādīnaṃ sarīrappamāṇameva hutvā sālibhattarāsi viya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1149_2: Tesu yattha katthaci “puḷavakapaṭikkūlaṃ puḷavakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1149_3: Cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa hi kāḷadīghavāpiyā anto hatthikuṇape nimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n:1149_5: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ sālibhattapiṇḍo viya sannisinnaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1150_0: Aṭṭhikaṃ “seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhisaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsalohitaṃ nahārusambandha”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1150_2: tattha purimanayeneva gantvā samantā pāsāṇādīnaṃ vasena sanimittaṃ sārammaṇaṃ katvā idaṃ aṭṭhikanti sabhāvabhāvato
anya-e0101n:1151_1: Taṃ pana vaṇṇato setanti olokentassa na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1151_8: Tassa tassa aṭṭhino pariyantavasena paricchedato vavatthapetvā yadevettha pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1151_10: Tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasena pana ninnato ca thalato ca vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1151_15: Dvinnaṃ pana aṭṭhikānaṃ ghaṭitaghaṭitaṭṭhānavasena sandhito vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1151_17: Sabbattheva pana ñāṇaṃ cāretvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne idamaṭṭhīti samantato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1151_18: Evampi nimitte anupaṭṭhahante nalāṭaṭṭhimhi cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1152_2: evaṃ idaṃ ekādasavidhena nimittaggahaṇaṃ ito purimesu puḷavakādīsupi yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1152_3: Idañca pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ sakalāyapi aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāya ekasmimpi aṭṭhike sampajjati.
anya-e0101n:1152_4: Tasmā tesu yatthakatthaci ekādasavidhena nimittaṃ uggahetvā “aṭṭhikapaṭikkūlaṃ aṭṭhikapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1152_5: Idha uggahanimittampi paṭibhāganimittampi ekasadisameva hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1152_9: Ekaṭṭhikepi ca uggahanimittena bībhacchena bhayānakena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1153_0: Imasmiṃ hi okāse yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1153_2: Tathā hi tattha “catūsu brahmavihāresu dasasu ca asubhesu paṭibhāganimittaṃ natthi.
anya-e0101n:1153_4: Dasasu ca asubhesu nibbikappaṃ katvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī”ti vatvāpi puna anantarameva
anya-e0101n:1153_6: Uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1154_0: Apica mahātissattherassa dantaṭṭhikamattāvalokanena sakalitthisarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni cettha nidassanānīti.
anya-e0101n:1157_0: Evaṃ tāni ca tesañca, bhāvanānayamimaṃ viditvāna;
anya-e0101n:1160_1: Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya nilloluppacāro hoti.
anya-e0101n:1160_3: so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1160_4: Chavasarīraṃ hi paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā,
anya-e0101n:1160_6: Iti yādisaṃ yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ,
anya-e0101n:1160_7: tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikkūlanti evaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena
anya-e0101n:1161_0: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato saṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1161_2: Vipubbakaṃ kāyavaṇapaṭibaddhassa duggandhabhāvassa pakāsanato mālāgandhādivasena samuṭṭhāpitasarīragandharāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1161_4: Vikkhāyitakaṃ maṃsupacayasampattivināsappakāsanato thanādīsu sarīrappadesesu maṃsupacayarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1161_8: Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1161_9: Aṭṭhikaṃ sarīraṭṭhīnaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvappakāsanato dantasampattirāgino sappāyanti evaṃ rāgacaritabhedavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1162_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1162_2: evameva dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1163_0: Paṭikkūlepi ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti evamānisaṃsadassāvitāya
anya-e0101n:1163_2: “bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī”ti ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya,
anya-e0101n:1164_1: Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti.
anya-e0101n:1164_3: Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīre,
anya-e0101n:1164_5: hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ olokentassa saṅgharakkhitattherūpaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca jīvamānakasarīrepi upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1164_8: Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā na paññāyati.
anya-e0101n:1164_9: Pakatiyā pana idaṃ sarīraṃ nāma atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussayaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ navanhārusatanibandhanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1164_10: navamaṃsapesisatānulittaṃ allacammapariyonaddhaṃ chaviyā paṭicchannaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ medakathālikā viya
anya-e0101n:1164_11: niccuggharitapaggharitaṃ kimisaṅghanisevitaṃ rogānaṃ āyatanaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ vatthu paribhinnapurāṇagaṇḍo
anya-e0101n:1164_21: hutvā gāmena gāmaṃ vicaranto rājāpi pupphachaḍḍakacaṇḍālādīsu aññataropi samasarīrapaṭikkūlatāya nibbiseso hoti,
anya-e0101n:1164_22: evaṃ asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlatāya rañño vā caṇḍālassa vā sarīre vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1164_23: Dantakaṭṭhamukhadhovanādīhi panettha dantamalādīni pamajjitvā nānāvatthehi hirikopīnaṃ paṭicchādetvā
anya-e0101n:1164_24: nānāvaṇṇena surabhivilepanena vilimpitvā pupphābharaṇādīhi alaṅkaritvā “ahaṃ mama”nti gahetabbākārappattaṃ karonti.
anya-e0101n:1164_25: Tato iminā āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā tadassa yāthāvasarasaṃ asubhalakkhaṇaṃ asañjānantā purisā itthīsu,
anya-e0101n:1164_27: Paramatthato panettha rajjitabbakayuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṇumattampi natthi.
anya-e0101n:1164_28: Tathā hi kesalomanakhadantakheḷasiṅghāṇikauccārapassāvādīsu ekakoṭṭhāsampi sarīrato bahi patitaṃ sattā hatthena chupitumpi na icchanti,
anya-e0101n:1164_31: taṃ taṃ evaṃ paṭikkūlampi samānaṃ avijjandhakārapariyonaddhā attasineharāgarattā “iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti gaṇhanti.
anya-e0101n:1164_32: Te evaṃ gaṇhantā aṭaviyaṃ kiṃsukarukkhaṃ disvā rukkhato apatitapupphaṃ “ayaṃ maṃsapesī”ti vihaññamānena jarasiṅgālena samānataṃ āpajjanti. Tasmā –
anya-e0101n:1165_0: Yathāpi pupphitaṃ disvā, siṅgālo kiṃsukaṃ vane;
anya-e0101n:1166_0: Maṃsarukkho mayā laddho, iti gantvāna vegasā.
anya-e0101n:1168_0: Nayidaṃ maṃsaṃ aduṃ maṃsaṃ, yaṃ rukkhasminti gaṇhati.
anya-e0101n:1171_0: Imañhi subhato kāyaṃ, gahetvā tattha mucchitā;
anya-e0101n:1172_0: Bālā karontā pāpāni, dukkhā na parimuccare.
anya-e0101n:1173_0: Tasmā passeyya medhāvī, jīvato vā matassa vā;
anya-e0101n:1180_0: Sace imassa kāyassa, anto bāhirako siyā;
anya-e0101n:1181_0: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe nivārayeti.
anya-e0101n:1182_0: Tasmā dabbajātikena bhikkhunā jīvamānasarīraṃ vā hotu
anya-e0101n:1183_0: Matasarīraṃ vā yattha yattha asubhākāro paññāyati,
anya-e0101n:1183_1: tattha tattheva nimittaṃ gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbanti.
anya-e0101n:1190_1: Asubhānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāsu pana dasasu anussatīsu punappunaṃ uppajjanato satiyeva anussati,
anya-e0101n:1190_2: pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā saddhāpabbajitassa kulaputtassa anurūpā satītipi anussati,
anya-e0101n:1190_14: devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1190_19: kāyagatā ca sā sati cāti kāyagatasatīti vattabbe rassaṃ akatvā kāyagatāsatīti vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1191_1: Iti imāsu dasasu anussatīsu buddhānussatiṃ tāva bhāvetukāmena aveccappasādasamannāgatena yoginā patirūpasenāsane
anya-e0101n:1191_2: rahogatena paṭisallīnena “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū
anya-e0101n:1191_3: anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato guṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n:1192_4: Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1193_1: Tattha ārakattā arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti anussarati.
anya-e0101n:1193_2: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1194_0: So tato ārakā nāma, yassa yenāsamaṅgitā;
anya-e0101n:1195_0: Asamaṅgī ca dosehi, nātho tenārahaṃ matoti.
anya-e0101n:1196_0: 126. Te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1199_1: Yañcetaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemi āsavasamudayamayena akkhena
anya-e0101n:1199_3: tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ
anya-e0101n:1199_4: gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1200_1: Atha vā saṃsāracakkanti anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1200_8: Kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_9: rūpabhave avijjā rūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_10: arūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_11: Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n:1200_13: Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_16: Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṃ kāmabhave saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_17: rūpabhave nāmarūpaṃ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_18: arūpabhave nāmaṃ arūpabhave ekassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_19: Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṃ kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1200_20: rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n:1200_21: arūpabhave ekaṃ āyatanaṃ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_22: Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṃ vedanānaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n:1200_24: arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_25: Kāmabhave cha vedanā kāmabhave channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n:1200_27: arūpabhave ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_28: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa,
anya-e0101n:1201_1: Idhekacco kāme paribhuñjissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
anya-e0101n:1202_0: Aparo saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva sucaritaṃ carati,
anya-e0101n:1202_2: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n:1203_0: Aparo pana brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayāeva mettaṃ bhāveti, karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1203_3: Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n:1204_0: Aparo arūpabhave sampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattiyo bhāveti,

anya-e0101n:1226_1: Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno.
anya-e0101n:1226_2: Tattha vijjāti tissopi vijjā aṭṭhapi vijjā.

anya-e0101n:1226_12: Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ,

anya-e0101n:1226_15: Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca caraṇena samannāgato.
anya-e0101n:1227_0: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n:1227_2: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojeti.

anya-e0101n:1228_9: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato.

anya-e0101n:1228_16: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”ti,

anya-e0101n:1228_21: Tatridaṃ sādhakasuttaṃ “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ,

anya-e0101n:1229_2: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:1229_4: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati,
anya-e0101n:1229_5: nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi, na cāhaṃ, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:1229_6: apatvāva lokassa antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi.
anya-e0101n:1229_8: imasmiññeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1231_0: Na ca apatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1236_1: Apica tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0101n:1236_2: Tattha eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1236_3: Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
anya-e0101n:1237_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharanti, disā bhanti virocamānā;
anya-e0101n:1238_0: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vasoti. –
anya-e0101n:1239_2: Tathā hissa “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā.
anya-e0101n:1239_13: Aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0101n:1240_0: Yasmā panesa sabbesampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti,

anya-e0101n:1277_1: Attanā pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.

anya-e0101n:1278_3: Tattha purisadammāti adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi.

anya-e0101n:1279_0: Apica bhagavā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttari maggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
anya-e0101n:1280_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1280_2: yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti.
anya-e0101n:1280_6: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1281_4: Yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti corakantāraṃ tāreti vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti
anya-e0101n:1281_5: nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti uttāreti nittāreti patāreti khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpeti,
anya-e0101n:1281_6: evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti,
anya-e0101n:1281_12: Tepi hi bhagavato dhammassavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti.
anya-e0101n:1282_0: Bhagavati kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desiyamāne eko maṇḍūko bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi,
anya-e0101n:1282_1: taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍaṃ olubbha tiṭṭhanto sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n:1282_2: So tāvadeva kālaṅkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
anya-e0101n:1282_3: Suttappabuddho viya ca tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ disvā “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto,
anya-e0101n:1282_4: kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti āvajjento na aññaṃ kiñci addasa aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā.
anya-e0101n:1282_5: So tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi.

anya-e0101n:1302_0: Tattha vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyayotiādikaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ

anya-e0101n:1303_6: Tasmā bhaggattā etesaṃ parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1305_0: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1306_0: Bhāgyavatāya cassa satapuññalakkhaṇadharassa rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1307_0: Yasmā ca loke issariyadhammayasasirikāmapayattesu chasu dhammesu bhagasaddo pavattati,
anya-e0101n:1307_6: Yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā,
anya-e0101n:1307_7: tassa tassa tatheva abhinipphannattā icchitatthanibbattisaññito kāmo.

anya-e0101n:1311_2: iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena bhagavāti buddhaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1311_5: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgatamārabbha.
anya-e0101n:1311_6: Iccassa evaṃ rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa kammaṭṭhānābhimukhatāya ujugatacittassa buddhaguṇapoṇā vitakkavicārā pavattanti.
anya-e0101n:1311_10: Sukhino buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā cittaṃ samādhiyatīti anukkamena ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n:1311_11: Buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1311_12: Tadetaṃ buddhaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā buddhānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:1312_0: Imañca pana buddhānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso,
anya-e0101n:1312_5: Buddhaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1312_7: Vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viya hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1317_1: Dhammānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpi rahogatena paṭisallīnena “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko
anya-e0101n:1317_2: ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti evaṃ pariyattidhammassa ceva navavidhassa ca lokuttaradhammassa
anya-e0101n:1318_1: Svākkhātoti imasmiṃ hi pade pariyattidhammopi saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n:1318_3: Tattha pariyattidhammo tāva svākkhāto ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇattā sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanattā ca.
anya-e0101n:1318_15: veneyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1319_0: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1319_9: Taṃ sutvā tathatthāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1320_0: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1320_1: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇaṃ āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1320_2: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇaṃ āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇoti
anya-e0101n:1321_0: Yaṃ panesa bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti nānānayehi dīpeti,
anya-e0101n:1322_3: nirupakkilesato nittaraṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhanti evaṃ sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanato
anya-e0101n:1323_1: Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati,
anya-e0101n:1323_5: na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati.
anya-e0101n:1323_7: ime dhammā niyyānikāti evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti.
anya-e0101n:1324_0: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:1324_1: “supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca.
anya-e0101n:1324_2: Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti,
anya-e0101n:1324_3: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti.

anya-e0101n:1328_1: “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.

anya-e0101n:1361_2: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti evaṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1362_1: yesaṃ ādimhi vā ante vā ekampi na bhinnaṃ,

anya-e0101n:1362_9: Avisesena vā sabbānipi sattavidhena methunasaṃyogena kodhupanāhādīhi ca pāpadhammehi anupahatattā akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni.

anya-e0101n:1362_14: atha vā pana maggasamādhiṃ phalasamādhiñcāpi saṃvattentīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni.

anya-e0101n:1513_5: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1514_0: Evaṃ kālasataṃ kālasahassaṃ kālasatasahassampi vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n:1514_1: Vacasā sajjhāyena hi kammaṭṭhānatanti paguṇā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1514_2: na ito cito ca cittaṃ vidhāvati.
anya-e0101n:1514_4: hatthasaṅkhalikā viya vatipādapanti viya ca khāyanti.
anya-e0101n:1515_2: Vacasā sajjhāyo hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1518_0: Disatoti imasmiṃ hi sarīre nābhito uddhaṃ uparimadisā,
anya-e0101n:1518_2: tasmā ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imissā nāma disāyāti disā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1519_0: Okāsatoti ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imasmiṃ nāma okāse patiṭṭhitoti evaṃ tassa tassa okāso vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1520_1: Tattha ayaṃ koṭṭhāso heṭṭhā ca upari ca tiriyañca iminā nāma paricchinnoti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1520_3: lomāpi na kesāti evaṃ amissakatāvasena visabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1521_0: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhantena pana idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ asukasmiṃ sutte paṭikkūlavasena kathitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1522_7: tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1522_8: Tattha anupubbatoti idañhi sajjhāyakaraṇato paṭṭhāya anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1522_10: Ekantarikāya hi manasikaronto yathā nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ ekantarikāya ārohanto kilantakāyo patati,
anya-e0101n:1522_12: evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamā kilantacitto patati,
anya-e0101n:1523_1: Atisīghato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tiyojanamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā okkamanavissajjanaṃ asallakkhetvā sīghena
anya-e0101n:1523_2: javena satakkhattumpi gamanāgamanaṃ karoto purisassa kiñcāpi addhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n:1524_2: Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tadaheva tiyojanamaggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
anya-e0101n:1525_0: Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0101n:1525_1: Appaṭibāhato hi yathā nāma ekapadikaṃ papātamaggaṃ paṭipannassa purisassa akkamanapadaṃ asallakkhetvā ito cito ca vilokayato padavāro virajjhati,
anya-e0101n:1525_3: evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
anya-e0101n:1526_2: Yathā hi udakadullabhakāle manussā araññe udapānaṃ disvā tattha tālapaṇṇādikaṃ kiñcideva saññāṇaṃ bandhitvā
anya-e0101n:1526_3: tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca.
anya-e0101n:1526_4: Yadā pana nesaṃ abhiṇhasañcārena āgatāgatapadaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1526_6: icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca,
anya-e0101n:1526_7: evameva pubbabhāge kesā lomātipaṇṇattivasena manasikaroto paṭikkūlabhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1526_8: Atha kesā lomātipaṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1527_0: Anupubbamuñcanatoti yo yo koṭṭhāso na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1527_2: Ādikammikassa hi kesāti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā muttanti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1527_3: Muttanti ca manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā kesāti imaṃ ādikoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1527_4: Athassa manasikaroto manasikaroto keci koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n:1527_8: Yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu tesampi eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati,
anya-e0101n:1527_9: evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ pana tameva punappunaṃ manasikarontena appanā uppādetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1528_1: yathā hi dvattiṃsatālake tālavane vasantaṃ makkaṭaṃ gahetukāmo luddo ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ kareyya,
anya-e0101n:1528_2: atha kho so makkaṭo paṭipāṭiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā pariyantatālameva gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:1528_3: tatthapi gantvā luddena tatheva kate puna teneva nayena āditālaṃ āgaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:1528_4: so evaṃ punappunaṃ paripātiyamāno ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvā anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā
anya-e0101n:1528_5: tassa vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānopi na uṭṭhaheyya,
anya-e0101n:1529_5: Makkaṭassa dvattiṃsatālake tālavane nivāso viya yogino cittassa dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake kāye ārammaṇavasena anusañcaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1529_6: Luddena ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiyā katāya makkaṭassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā
anya-e0101n:1529_7: pariyantatālagamanaṃ viya yogino kesāti manasikāre āraddhe paṭipāṭiyā gantvā pariyosānakoṭṭhāseyeva cittassa
anya-e0101n:1529_10: Punappunaṃ paripātiyamānassa makkaṭassa ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāne uṭṭhānaṃ viya punappunaṃ manasikaroto kesuci
anya-e0101n:1529_11: kesuci upaṭṭhitesu anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu parikammakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1529_12: Anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā tassa majjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānassapi
anya-e0101n:1529_13: anuṭṭhānaṃ viya avasāne dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1530_1: yathā nāma piṇḍapātiko bhikkhu dvattiṃsakulaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vasanto paṭhamageheyeva dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekaṃ vissajjeyya.
anya-e0101n:1530_2: Punadivase tisso labhitvā parato dve vissajjeyya.
anya-e0101n:1530_3: Tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā paribhuñjeyya.
anya-e0101n:1530_7: Tassa taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vāso viya yogino dvattiṃsākāre parikammakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1530_8: Paṭhamagehe dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekissā vissajjanaṃ viya dutiyadivase tisso labhitvā parato dvinnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1530_9: vissajjanaṃ viya ca manasikaroto manasikaroto anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu yāva koṭṭhāsadvaye
anya-e0101n:1530_11: Tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā paribhogo viya dvīsu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1531_0: Appanātoti appanākoṭṭhāsato kesādīsu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse appanā hotīti veditabbāti ayamevettha adhippāyo.
anya-e0101n:1532_2: bojjhaṅgakosallanti ime tayo suttantā vīriyasamādhiyojanatthaṃ veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tattha –
anya-e0101n:1533_8: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
anya-e0101n:1533_11: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
anya-e0101n:1533_14: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammā samādhiyeyya āsavānaṃ khayāya.
anya-e0101n:1533_17: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālenakālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ paggahanimittaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0101n:1533_18: taṃ hoti cittaṃ muduñca kammaññañca pabhassarañca,
anya-e0101n:1534_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṃ bandhati,
anya-e0101n:1534_4: ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpetvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipitvā kālenakālaṃ abhidhamati,
anya-e0101n:1534_8: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ abhidhameyya,
anya-e0101n:1534_11: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ udakena paripphoseyya,
anya-e0101n:1534_14: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ ajjhupekkheyya,
anya-e0101n:1534_15: ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ na sammā paripākaṃ gaccheyya.
anya-e0101n:1534_18: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ kālenakālaṃ abhidhamati,
anya-e0101n:1534_21: taṃ hoti jātarūpaṃ muduñca kammaññañca pabhassarañca,
anya-e0101n:1534_24: Yassā yassā ca piḷandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati yadi paṭikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya yadi gīveyyāya yadi suvaṇṇamālāya,
anya-e0101n:1535_4: Yassa yassa ca abhiññā sacchi karaṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchi kiriyāya,
anya-e0101n:1535_5: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
anya-e0101n:1537_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
anya-e0101n:1537_16: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti.
anya-e0101n:1539_3: akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti appanākosallakathāyaṃ dassitameva.
anya-e0101n:1540_0: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā idañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā
anya-e0101n:1540_1: tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1540_2: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n:1540_3: evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyujjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari kathāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1540_4: Aññattha vasitukāmena yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1540_5: chinditvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayeneva ananurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vasantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
anya-e0101n:1541_0: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n:1541_1: Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1541_3: Udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0101n:1541_8: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1543_1: Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhaāsayokāsavasena
anya-e0101n:1544_8: Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n:1544_11: dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo.
anya-e0101n:1544_13: lomā na kesāti evaṃ avasesaekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko ekakoṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo.
anya-e0101n:1545_1: Idaṃ pana nesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1546_0: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā kesamissakamidaṃ haratha nanti jigucchanti.
anya-e0101n:1546_2: Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti.
anya-e0101n:1547_0: Telamakkhanapupphadhūpādi saṅkhāravirahitānañca kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti.
anya-e0101n:1547_4: Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1547_8: Dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ gandhena pana paṭikkūlameva.
anya-e0101n:1547_9: Evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlā gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyevāti.
anya-e0101n:1548_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni honti aparibhogāni,
anya-e0101n:1548_1: evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā jegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ āsayato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1549_0: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā.
anya-e0101n:1549_1: Te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikkhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1549_2: jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ okāsato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1550_1: evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1550_2: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ visuṃ vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1551_1: Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā,
anya-e0101n:1551_5: Okāsato ṭhapetvā kesānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme jātā.
anya-e0101n:1551_6: Paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n:1553_4: Tesaṃ hi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā.
anya-e0101n:1553_5: Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno.
anya-e0101n:1553_12: Paricchedato heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n:1554_2: Tassa upari kāḷasāmapītādivaṇṇā chavi nāma yā sakalasarīratopi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1554_4: So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇappahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1556_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya uparimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1556_2: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa ca sīsacammassa ca
anya-e0101n:1556_3: antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1556_7: Tato piṭṭhicammaṃ taṃ vavatthapetvā anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1556_10: Atha gīvacammānantaraṃ heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1556_11: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1557_10: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1557_12: Okāsato vīsādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1558_4: Etesu hi gīvāya uparimabhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinandhamānā purimapassena otiṇṇā.
anya-e0101n:1558_13: Tathā vāmapādaṃ vinandhamānāpīti evaṃ sarīradhārakā nāma saṭṭhimahānhārū kāyaṃ vinandhamānā otiṇṇā.
anya-e0101n:1558_16: Aññe pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n:1558_27: Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi,
anya-e0101n:1559_1: Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni,
anya-e0101n:1561_2: Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ ānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1561_6: Tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā honti.
anya-e0101n:1563_0: Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīracakkalakasaṇṭhānāni.
anya-e0101n:1565_1: Aṭṭhimiñjanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ miñjaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1565_3: Saṇṭhānato mahantamahantānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ veḷunāḷiyaṃ pakkhittaseditamahāvettaggasaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1566_6: Okāsato galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1567_10: yaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti.
anya-e0101n:1567_16: paññācaritassa acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ niddhotajātimaṇi viya jutimantaṃ khāyati.
anya-e0101n:1567_18: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1568_2: Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ paṇḍukadhātukaṃ nātirattakumudassa pattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1568_3: Saṇṭhānato mūle ekaṃ agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1568_5: paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni.
anya-e0101n:1568_7: okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1569_7: appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1570_5: Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1570_6: yasmiṃ paharaṇappahārena bahinikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1571_4: Abbhantare asitapītānaṃ abhāve uggatena kammajatejusmānā abbhāhatattā saṃkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1571_6: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1572_1: Antanti purisassa dvattiṃsahatthā itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggā antavaṭṭi.
anya-e0101n:1572_5: Okāsato upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1573_5: Okāsato kuddālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakāni antabhoge
anya-e0101n:1573_6: ekato agaḷante ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā
anya-e0101n:1575_0: Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ antapaṭalaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1575_4: yattha takkoṭakā gaṇḍuppādakā tālahīrakā sūcimukhakā paṭatantasuttakā iccevamādidvattiṃsakulappabhedā
anya-e0101n:1575_6: ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhihananti,
anya-e0101n:1575_7: pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇavelāyañca uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā viluppanti,
anya-e0101n:1575_8: yaṃ tesaṃ kimīnaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti.
anya-e0101n:1575_9: Yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya nidāghasamaye thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakena
anya-e0101n:1575_11: dvīhatīhaccayena sañjātakimikulaṃ sūriyātapasantāpavegakuthitaṃ upari pheṇapupphuḷake muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1575_17: kimikulākulaṃ uparūpari pheṇapupphuḷakāni muñcantaṃ paramakasambuduggandhajegucchabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1575_20: Yattha ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vivekaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n:1575_25: eko bhāgo rasabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayati.
anya-e0101n:1576_0: Paricchedato udarapaṭalena ceva udariyabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1577_7: piṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto veḷunāḷikasadiso,
anya-e0101n:1577_8: yattha seyyathāpi nāma upari bhūmibhāge patitaṃ vassodakaṃ ogaḷitvā heṭṭhā bhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1577_9: evameva yaṃkiñci āmāsaye patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ nisadāya pisitamiva
anya-e0101n:1577_10: saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā antabilena ogaḷitvā ogaḷitvā omadditvā veḷupabbe pakkhipamānapaṇḍumattikā viya
anya-e0101n:1577_12: Paricchedato pakkāsayapaṭalena ceva karīsabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1578_6: Okāsato sīsakaṭāhabbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhānetvā ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍā viya samohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1578_7: Paricchedato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantaratalehi ceva matthaluṅgabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1579_7: Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca
anya-e0101n:1579_9: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti, bhamanti,
anya-e0101n:1579_12: Baddhapittaṃ hadayapapphāsānaṃ antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosakasadise pittakosake ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1580_6: Yaṃ pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe vā kathale vā patante chijjitvā
anya-e0101n:1580_8: evameva pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1580_9: yamhi ca mandībhūte pakkagaṇḍo viya pūtikukkuṭaṇḍamiva ca udaraṃ paramajegucchaṃ kuṇapagandhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1580_10: tato uggatena ca gandhena uddekopi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1580_11: So ca puriso apehi duggandhaṃ vāyasīti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0101n:1580_12: yañca vaḍḍhitvā bahalattamāpannaṃ pidhānaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyaṃ udarapaṭalassa abbhantareyeva kuṇapagandhaṃ sannirumbhitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1581_6: Okāsato pana pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi,
anya-e0101n:1581_8: yatra yatra khāṇukaṇṭakapaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
anya-e0101n:1582_7: Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca
anya-e0101n:1582_9: Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapatthapūramattaṃ hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ upari
anya-e0101n:1582_10: thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1582_11: Tasmiṃ hi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
anya-e0101n:1583_6: yattha so lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0101n:1583_9: tasmā tassa saṇṭhānampi kesalomakūpavivarānaññeva vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1583_10: Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yoginā kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva sedo manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0101n:1584_2: Saṇṭhānato thūlasarīrassa tāva cammamaṃsantare ṭhapitahaliddivaṇṇadukūlapilotikasaṇṭhāno hoti.
anya-e0101n:1584_3: Kisasarīrassa jaṅghamaṃsaṃ ūrumaṃsaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakanissitaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ udaravaṭṭimaṃsanti etāni nissāya
anya-e0101n:1584_6: Okāsato thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito,
anya-e0101n:1584_7: yaṃ sinehasaṅkhaṃ gatampi paramajegucchattā neva muddhani telatthāya,
anya-e0101n:1585_6: Na cetaṃ pittakosake pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1585_7: Yadā pana sattā somanassajātā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti,
anya-e0101n:1585_10: yadā ca nesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti.
anya-e0101n:1585_11: Tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisabhāgāhārautūhi samuṭṭhahitvā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n:1585_12: Assupariggaṇhakena ca yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1586_7: Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnāva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1586_8: Yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi te padesā usmājātā honti,
anya-e0101n:1586_9: tadā tattha nhānakāle pasannaudakūpari sinehabinduvisaṭo viya ito cito ca sañcarati.
anya-e0101n:1587_6: Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhito.
anya-e0101n:1587_7: Na cesa ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:1587_8: Yadā pana sattā tathārūpamāhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā,
anya-e0101n:1587_12: tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1587_15: mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ nadīpuline khatakūpakasalilaṃ viya
anya-e0101n:1588_6: Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1588_7: atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminipatte dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya,
anya-e0101n:1588_8: athānena chiddena dadhimuttaṃ gaḷitvā bahi pateyya,
anya-e0101n:1588_11: tadā anto sīsato pūtisemhabhāvamāpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n:1588_12: Siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena ca yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1589_5: Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n:1589_7: tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa samiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti,
anya-e0101n:1589_13: dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati,
anya-e0101n:1590_7: Yattha seyyathāpi candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe candanikāraso pavisati,
anya-e0101n:1590_12: Yamhi ca muttassa bharite passāvaṃ karomāti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1590_13: Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1591_1: Evañhi kesādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato nātisīghatotiādinā
anya-e0101n:1591_2: nayena vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlāti manasikaroto paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāne
anya-e0101n:1591_3: seyyathāpi cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ kusumānaṃ ekasuttakaganthitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa sabbapupphāni
anya-e0101n:1591_5: evameva atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesāti imaṃ kāyaṃ olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyāva pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0101n:1591_6: Tena vuttaṃ manasikārakosallakathāyaṃ “ādikammikassa hi kesāti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā muttanti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1592_1: athassa evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n:1592_2: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhipamānamiva upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1593_0: Athassa anupubbamuñcanādivasena paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlāti punappunaṃ manasikaroto anukkamena appanā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1593_3: Taṃ āsevato bhāvayato vuttanayena asubhakammaṭṭhānesu viya paṭhamajjhānavaseneva appanā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1594_0: Sā yassa ekova koṭṭhāso pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1594_1: ekasmiṃ vā koṭṭhāse appanaṃ patvā puna aññasmiṃ yogaṃ na karoti,
anya-e0101n:1594_3: Yassa pana aneke koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā honti,
anya-e0101n:1594_4: ekasmiṃ vā jhānaṃ patvā puna aññasmiṃpi yogaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:1594_5: tassa mallakattherassa viya koṭṭhāsagaṇanāya paṭhamajjhānāni nibbattanti.
anya-e0101n:1595_0: So kirāyasmā dīghabhāṇakaabhayattheraṃ hatthe gahetvā “āvuso abhaya,
anya-e0101n:1595_1: imaṃ tāva pañhaṃ uggaṇhāhī”ti vatvā āha –
anya-e0101n:1596_0: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena ijjhamānampi cetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu satibalena ijjhanato kāyagatāsatīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1597_8: Kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhedaṃ nissāya catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ lābhī hoti.
anya-e0101n:1602_3: ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro,
anya-e0101n:1602_4: uppannuppanne ca pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsitvā –
anya-e0101n:1603_2: ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro,
anya-e0101n:1603_3: uppannuppanne ca pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasameti? Idha,
anya-e0101n:1603_5: bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0101n:1603_7: Dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0101n:1603_10: rassaṃ vā passasanto rassaṃ passasāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0101n:1604_2: So pana yasmā pāḷivaṇṇanānusāreneva vuccamāno sabbākāraparipūro hoti.
anya-e0101n:1605_3: ānāpānassati samādhīti ettha tāva kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanaṃ nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāpucchā.
anya-e0101n:1605_4: Bhāvito ca bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhīti nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāya puṭṭhadhammanidassanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1605_8: Ānāpānassatisamādhīti ānāpānapariggāhikāya satiyā saddhiṃ sampayutto samādhi.
anya-e0101n:1605_11: Santoceva paṇīto cāti santo ceva paṇīto ceva.
anya-e0101n:1605_14: Ayañhi yathā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhavasena santañca paṇītañca,
anya-e0101n:1605_15: oḷārikārammaṇattā pana paṭikkūlārammaṇattā ca ārammaṇavasena neva santaṃ na paṇītaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1605_16: na evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena asanto vā apaṇīto vā,
anya-e0101n:1605_17: atha kho ārammaṇasantatāyapi santo vūpasanto nibbuto,
anya-e0101n:1606_0: Asecanako ca sukho ca vihāroti ettha pana nāssa secananti asecanako,
anya-e0101n:1606_2: Natthi ettha parikammena vā upacārena vā santatā.
anya-e0101n:1606_3: Ādisamannāhārato pabhuti attano sabhāveneva santo ca paṇīto cāti attho.
anya-e0101n:1606_4: Keci pana asecanakoti anāsittako ojavanto sabhāveneva madhuroti vadanti.
anya-e0101n:1606_6: appitappitakkhaṇe kāyikacetasikasukhapaṭilābhāya saṃvattanato sukho ca vihāroti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1607_2: kena pakārena kenākārena kena vidhinā bhāvito ānāpānassatisamādhi kena pakārena bahulīkato santo ceva…pe…
anya-e0101n:1608_5: Ayañhi ettha idhasaddo sabbappakāraānāpānassatisamādhinibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
anya-e0101n:1609_2: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiārammaṇaṃ abhiruhituṃ na icchati,
anya-e0101n:1609_4: Tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
anya-e0101n:1609_5: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya,
anya-e0101n:1609_6: athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
anya-e0101n:1609_7: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato apanetvā araññaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0101n:1609_8: suññāgāraṃ vā pavesetvā tattha assāsapassāsathambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1609_9: Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
anya-e0101n:1609_10: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca.
anya-e0101n:1610_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e0101n:1613_0: Atha vā yasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānappabhede muddhabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1613_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ bhāvetuṃ,
anya-e0101n:1613_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
anya-e0101n:1613_4: tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ.
anya-e0101n:1614_1: so yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
anya-e0101n:1614_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
anya-e0101n:1614_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati,
anya-e0101n:1614_4: tato tattha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttena yoginā kamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:1615_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:1615_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamagge ceva ariyaphalañca gaṇhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1619_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.

anya-e0101n:1673_8: Rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1673_9: na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti,
anya-e0101n:1673_10: na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti,
anya-e0101n:1674_4: Yathā rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1674_5: na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti,
anya-e0101n:1674_6: na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti,
anya-e0101n:1674_10: evameva bhikkhu nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinno hoti,

anya-e0101n:1674_12: na ca āgatā vā gatā vā assāsapassāsā aviditā honti,

anya-e0101n:1678_0: So imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1679_0: Ayaṃ kakacūpamā. Idha panassa āgatāgatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojananti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1680_1: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci na cireneva nimittañca uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:1680_3: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1680_5: Yathā sāraddhakāyassa mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, vikūjati,
anya-e0101n:1680_7: Asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati,
anya-e0101n:1680_12: Evameva gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1681_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n:1681_1: Tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ pavattatiyeva. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n:1681_2: Yathā puriso mahatiyā lohasalākāya kaṃsathālaṃ ākoṭeyya,
anya-e0101n:1681_5: Niruddhe oḷārike sadde atha pacchā sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1681_6: tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ saddanimittārammaṇaṃ pavattateva,
anya-e0101n:1682_1: Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti,
anya-e0101n:1682_3: Idaṃ pana uparūpari bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n:1682_5: evaṃ anupaṭṭhahante pana tasmiṃ tena bhikkhunā uṭṭhāyāsanā cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā na gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1682_8: “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti vā na vuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1682_9: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva hoti.

anya-e0101n:1683_20: Athānena pakatiphuṭṭhavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.

anya-e0101n:1683_24: Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “nāhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1684_1: Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati.
anya-e0101n:1684_2: Ito aññaṃ pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1684_3: Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ garukabhāvanaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ mahāpurisānaṃyeva manasikārabhūmibhūtaṃ,

anya-e0101n:1685_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1685_2: evameva maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi,
anya-e0101n:1685_4: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1686_0: Yathā pana kassako kasiṃ kasitvā balībadde muñcitvā gocaramukhe katvā chāyāya nisinno vissameyya,
anya-e0101n:1686_1: athassa te balībaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ.
anya-e0101n:1686_3: so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍahi,
anya-e0101n:1686_4: atha kho rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātanatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā,
anya-e0101n:1686_5: atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātanatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā
anya-e0101n:1686_6: rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā puna kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n:1686_7: evameva tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1686_8: Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1686_9: Evañhissa manasikaroto na cirasseva te upaṭṭhahanti nipātanatitthe viya goṇā.
anya-e0101n:1686_10: Tatonena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena vijjhantena punappunaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1687_2: Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1687_3: Apica kho kassaci sukhasamphassaṃ uppādayamāno tūlapicu viya kappāsapicu viya vātadhārā viya ca upaṭṭhātīti ekacce āhu.
anya-e0101n:1688_1: idañhi kassaci tārakarūpaṃ viya maṇiguḷikā viya muttāguḷikā viya ca,
anya-e0101n:1688_2: kassaci kharasamphassaṃ hutvā kappāsaṭṭhi viya dārusārasūci viya ca,
anya-e0101n:1688_3: kassaci dīghapāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya kusumadāmaṃ viya dhūmasikhā viya ca,
anya-e0101n:1688_4: kassaci vitthataṃ makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya valāhakapaṭalaṃ viya padumapupphaṃ viya rathacakkaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ viya sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1688_5: Tañca panetaṃ yathā sambahulesu bhikkhūsu suttantaṃ sajjhāyitvā nisinnesu ekena bhikkhunā “tumhākaṃ kīdisaṃ
anya-e0101n:1688_6: hutvā idaṃ suttaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vutte eko “mayhaṃ mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viya hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:1688_8: Añño “mayhaṃ eko sītacchāyo sākhāsampanno phalabhārabharitarukkho viyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1688_9: Tesaṃ hi taṃ ekameva suttaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1688_10: Evaṃ ekameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti.

anya-e0101n:1698_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0101n:1698_4: Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva vaṇṇato manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1698_6: Apica kho khattiyamahesiyā cakkavattigabbho viya kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca āvāsādīni satta asappāyāni
anya-e0101n:1698_7: vajjetvā tāneva satta sappāyāni sevantena sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1698_8: Atha naṃ evaṃ rakkhitvā punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1698_10: Tassevaṃ ghaṭentassa pathavīkasiṇe vuttānukkameneva tasmiṃ nimitte catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattanti.
anya-e0101n:1699_1: Evaṃ nibbattacatukkapañcakajjhāno panettha bhikkhu sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0101n:1699_2: pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo tadeva jhānaṃ pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1699_4: So hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati.
anya-e0101n:1699_5: Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto sañcarati,
anya-e0101n:1699_7: Tato assāsapassāse ca kāyañca rūpanti cittañca taṃsampayuttadhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n:1700_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati.
anya-e0101n:1700_1: Pariyesanto ca naṃ disvā tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
anya-e0101n:1700_2: Vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne obhāsādayo
anya-e0101n:1700_3: dasa vipassanupakkilese pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ maggoti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1700_4: patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena vayato upaṭṭhitesu sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto
anya-e0101n:1700_5: yathākkamena cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāya ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa
anya-e0101n:1700_6: pariyantaṃ patto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1701_0: Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti ayaṃ sabbākārato paṭhamacatukkavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:1702_1: Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1702_2: Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva tesaṃ evaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1703_0: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n:1703_1: Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
anya-e0101n:1704_2: Tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
anya-e0101n:1704_5: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n:1704_6: Tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_0: “Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_1: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_6: passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_7: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_9: Jānato passato paccavekkhato cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato saddhāya adhimuccato vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato satiṃ upaṭṭhāpayato
anya-e0101n:1705_10: cittaṃ samādahato paññāya pajānato abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaroto
anya-e0101n:1706_5: Sukhapaṭisaṃvedīpade cettha vipassanābhūmidassanatthaṃ “sukhanti dve sukhāni kāyikañca sukhaṃ cetasikañcā”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1706_6: Passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento,
anya-e0101n:1707_2: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato
anya-e0101n:1707_3: saññāsampayuttā vedanāti evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1708_1: Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1708_2: Abhippamodayaṃ cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n:1708_3: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
anya-e0101n:1709_2: So samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttapītiyā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
anya-e0101n:1709_4: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttapītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n:1709_5: Evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
anya-e0101n:1709_6: Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1710_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento.
anya-e0101n:1710_1: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sampassato vipassanākkhaṇe
anya-e0101n:1710_3: Evaṃ uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento “samādahaṃ
anya-e0101n:1711_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
anya-e0101n:1711_4: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n:1711_5: So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento,
anya-e0101n:1711_11: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento assasati ceva passasati ca.
anya-e0101n:1711_12: Tena vuccati “vimocayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1711_13: Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1712_1: Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1713_4: nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena bhedoti attho.
anya-e0101n:1713_5: Aniccānupassanāti tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu aniccanti anupassanā.
anya-e0101n:1713_7: Tasmā evaṃbhūto assasanto passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1714_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca.
anya-e0101n:1714_3: Virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassanavasena pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca.
anya-e0101n:1714_4: Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1715_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo ca.
anya-e0101n:1716_0: Vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0101n:1716_1: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1716_2: Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0101n:1716_3: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1716_4: Ubhayampi pana purimapurimaññāṇānaṃ anuanupassanato anupassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1716_5: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca “paṭinissaggānupassī
anya-e0101n:1717_2: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1717_3: Evaṃ soḷasavatthuvasena ca pana ayaṃ ānāpānassati mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā.
anya-e0101n:1718_3: ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto cā”tiādivacanato santabhāvādivasenāpi mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā,
anya-e0101n:1718_5: Ayañhi santapaṇītaasecanakasukhavihārattā samādhiantarāyakarānaṃ vitakkānaṃ vasena ito cito ca cittassa
anya-e0101n:1719_5: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti,

anya-e0101n:2054_17: viya viññāṇābhāvasaṅkhāte bahipadese ṭhitaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ

anya-e0101n:2070_1: Idāni āruppānantaraṃ ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto.
